{"t/css/ace-edit-browse.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. ittf-editor
		display flex
		flex-direction column !important
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	# ittf-editor-title
		height 20px !important
		width 100% !important
		padding 2px 8px

	. ittf-editor-panel
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	# editorContainer
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	. result-browser
		display flex
		flex-direction column !important
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	# result-browser-title
		height 20px !important
		width 100% !important
		padding 2px 8px

	. result-browser-panel
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	. result-browser-container
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	. result-browser-control
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important

	. result-iframe
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
"},"t/css/file-explorer.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. fl
		margin 12px 0

	. fl-nodes
		padding 0 8px

    . fl-icon
        height 16px !important
        width 16px !important
        @ fill currentcolor !important
        vertical-align middle !important
        opacity 0.7 !important"},"t/css/shell.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. sh
		display flex !important
	    flex-direction column !important
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
		background-color rgb(250, 250, 250) !important
		color rgb(17, 17, 17) !important
		overflow hidden !important

	. sh-he
		display flex !important
	    flex-direction row
		align-items center !important
		justify-content space-between !important
		height 60px !important
		background-color rgb(255, 255, 255) !important
		border-bottom 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) !important
		padding 10px 20px

	. sh-bo
		display flex !important
	    flex-direction row
		min-height 0px !important
		min-width 0px !important
		flex 1 1 0% !important
        width 100% !important

	. sh-bo-lsb
        -webkit-box-direction normal !important
        -webkit-box-orient vertical !important
        display flex !important
		min-width 10rem !important
        flex-direction column !important
		# bg for test
		background-color rgb(230, 230, 230) !important

    . sh-bo-lsb-schema-button        
        font-size 1.3em
        font-weight bold
        margin 5px
        padding 5px
        background-color #434343
        color #bbb
        border-radius 5px
        text-align center
        cursor pointer
        & :hover
            color #ddd
    . sh-bo-lsb-schema-button.selected
        color #fff
        font-size 1.35em

	. sh-bo-co
        -webkit-box-direction normal !important
        -webkit-box-orient vertical !important
        display flex !important
        flex-direction column !important
        min-width 0px !important
        min-height 0px !important
        flex 1 1 0% !important
        background-color #bcbcbc

    . sh-bo-co-title        
        font-size 1.5em
        font-weight bold
	
	. sh-bo-co-ge
		display flex !important
	    flex-direction row
		min-height 0px !important
		min-width 0px !important
		flex 1 1 0% !important
        margin 5px

	. sh-bo-co-ge-ittf
		height 100% !important
        width 50%

	. sh-bo-co-ge-result
		flex 1 1 0% !important
		height 100% !important
        width 50%

	. sh-bo-co-wi
		display flex !important
	    flex-direction row
		min-height 0px !important
		min-width 0px !important
		flex 1 1 0% !important
        margin 5px
        

	. sh-bo-co-wi-snippet
		height 100% !important
        width 50%

	. sh-bo-co-wi-result
		flex 1 1 0% !important
		height 100% !important
        width 50%

	. sh-fo
        -webkit-box-align center !important
        -webkit-box-direction normal !important
        -webkit-box-orient horizontal !important
        position relative !important
        display flex !important
        flex-direction row !important
        align-items center !important
        height 30px !important
        z-index 10 !important
        background-color rgb(255, 255, 255) !important
        color rgb(153, 153, 153) !important
        padding 0px 0.25em !important
        border-top 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) !important

	# gen-ittf-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh
        

	# gen-result-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh

	# snippet-source-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh

	# snippet-result-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh"},"t/css/bars.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. result-bar
		padding 3rem 0.1rem

	. result-cmd
		margin 1rem 0

	. result-cmd-btn
		width 100%
		background-color #ddd
        display inline-block
        padding 0.3em
        border 0.16em solid rgba(255,255,255,0)
        border-radius 1em
        box-sizing border-box
        text-decoration none
        font-family 'Roboto',sans-serif
        font-weight 300
        color #333333
        text-shadow 0 0.04em 0.04em rgba(0,0,0,0.35)
        text-align center
        transition all 0.2s
		& :hover
			border-color rgba(255,255,255,1)
"},"t/css/splash.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. splash-editor
		height 100%
		width 100%
		background-color rgb(230, 230, 230) !important

	. splash-result
		height 100%
		width 100%
		background-color rgb(230, 230, 230) !important"},"t/css/tree-node.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. tree-node
        position relative
		font-size 13px
		line-height 1.8
		. copying
			border 1px dashed #dedede
		. cutting
			border 1px dashed #dedede
			opacity 0.5
		. icon-item-group
			position relative !important
			display inline-block !important
			width 100% !important
			cursor pointer !important
			z-index 1 !important
			white-space nowrap !important
			outline 0px !important
			padding 0px 16px !important
		. item-name
			vertical-align -1px !important
			user-select none !important
			margin 0px 6px !important
    
	. tree-node .tree-child-leaves
        display block
        margin-left 15px
    
	. tree-node .hidden
        display none
    
	. tree-node .tree-expando
        background #ddd
        border-radius 3px
        cursor pointer
        float left
        height 10px
        line-height 10px
        position relative
        text-align center
        top 5px
        width 10px
    
	. tree-node .hidden
        visibility hidden
    
	. tree-node .tree-expando:hover
        background #aaa
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-text
        cursor pointer
        float left
        margin-left 5px
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-text:hover
        color blue
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-content
		display flex
		flex-direction row
		& :hover
			background #dedede

	. tree-node-context-menu-on
		background #cdcdcd
	
	$*
	. tree-node .tree-node-content:before
        + .tree-node .tree-node-content:after
        content " "
        display table
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-content:after
        clear both
	*$
"},"t/css/widgets/file-explorer.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. fl
		margin 12px 0

	. fl-nodes
		padding 0 8px

    . fl-icon
        height 16px !important
        width 16px !important
        @ fill currentcolor !important
        vertical-align middle !important
        opacity 0.7 !important"},"t/css/widgets/tree-node.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

"},"t/css/tailwind/layout/index.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
  $params &md

  $
      var count = [0,1,2,3,4,5];
      var sizes = ['s','m','l','x','xl','xxl'];
      var scale = ['0.6','0.8','1','1.3','1.6','2'];
      var scaleRad = ['3','6','12','18','30','48'];
      var scaleWidth = [15,25,35,65,75,85];
      var scale50 = [50,100,150,200];
      //

  flex( &md )
  grid( &md )

  . m-0-auto
      margin 0 auto
  
  $foreach c in scale50
      . m-${c}
          margin ${c}px
      . m-l-${c}
          margin-left ${c}px
      . m-r-${c}
          margin-right ${c}px
      . m-t-${c}
          margin-top ${c}px
      . m-b-${c}
          margin-bottom ${c}px
  
  $foreach c in count
      . m-${sizes[c]}
          margin ${scale[c]}em
      . m-t-${sizes[c]}
          margin-top ${scale[c]}em
      . m-b-${sizes[c]}
          margin-bottom ${scale[c]}em
      . m-l-${sizes[c]}
          margin-left ${scale[c]}em
      . m-r-${sizes[c]}
          margin-right ${scale[c]}em
      . m-w-${sizes[c]}
          margin-left ${scale[c]}em
          margin-right ${scale[c]}em
      . m-y-${sizes[c]}
          margin-top ${scale[c]}em
          margin-bottom ${scale[c]}em
      . p-${sizes[c]}
          padding ${scale[c]}em
      . p-t-${sizes[c]}
          padding-top ${scale[c]}em
      . p-b-${sizes[c]}
          padding-bottom ${scale[c]}em
      . p-l-${sizes[c]}
          padding-left ${scale[c]}em
      . p-r-${sizes[c]}
          padding-right ${scale[c]}em
      . p-w-${sizes[c]}
          padding-left ${scale[c]}em
          padding-right ${scale[c]}em
      . p-y-${sizes[c]}
          padding-top ${scale[c]}em
          padding-bottom ${scale[c]}em
"},"t/css/tailwind/layout/t/flex.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
  $params &md

  $if md.useFlex
    . flex
        display flex
        flex-direction row
    . flex-row
        display flex
        flex-direction row
    . flex-column
        display flex
        flex-direction column
    . justify-content-start
        justify-content start
    . justify-content-center
        justify-content center
    . justify-content-space-between
        justify-content space-between
    . space-between
        justify-content space-between
    . align-items-start
        align-items start
    . align-items-center
        align-items center"},"t/css/tailwind/layout/t/grid.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
  $params &md

  $if md.useGrid
    . grid
        display grid
"},"test.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"css
  $
    var md = {
      useFlex: true,
      useGrid: true,
    }
    //

  css/tailwind/layout/index(&md)
  css/tailwind/text(&md)
  $include css/droplist-menu
  $include css/shell
  $include css/responsive-multi-level-menu-three.css.ittf"},"t/css/tailwind/text.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
  $params &md
  
  $
    var count = [0,1,2,3,4,5];
    var sizes = ['s','m','l','x','xl','xxl'];
    var scale = ['0.6','0.8','1','1.3','1.6','2'];
    //

  $foreach c in count
    . font-${sizes[c]}
      font-size ${scale[c]}em

  . font-weight-s
      font-weight 300
  . font-weight-m
      font-weight 300
  . font-weight-l
      font-weight 500
  . font-weight-x
      font-weight 500
  . font-weight-xl
      font-weight 700
  . font-weight-xxl
      font-weight 700"},"toIttf/file.css":{"type":"CODE","contents":"
/* ================================================================ 
This copyright notice must be untouched at all times.

The original version of this stylesheet and the associated (x)html
is available at http://www.cssplay.co.uk/menus/cssplay-responsive-multi-level-menu-three.html
Copyright (c) Stu Nicholls. All rights reserved.
This stylesheet and the assocaited (x)html may be modified in any 
way to fit your requirements.
=================================================================== */
.cssplay_menu {width:100%; background:#ccc; text-align:center; height:45px; position:relative; z-index:100;}
.cssplay_menu > span {display:none;}
.cssplay_menu input {position:absolute; display:none;}
.cssplay_menu label {display:none;}
.cssplay_menu ul {margin:0; padding:0; list-style:none; white-space:nowrap; text-align:left;}
.cssplay_menu ul {display:inline-block;} 
.cssplay_menu ul {*display:inline;}

.cssplay_menu li {margin:0; padding:0; list-style:none;}
.cssplay_menu li {display:inline-block; display:inline;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul {position:absolute; left:-9999px; border-left:1px solid #ddd; border-right:1px solid #ddd;}
.cssplay_menu > ul {margin:0 auto;}
.cssplay_menu > ul > li {float:left; display:block; position:relative;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul li a {border-top:1px solid #ddd}
.cssplay_menu > ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:url(down.png); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: right center;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:url(right.png); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: right center;}
.cssplay_menu ul li.left ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:url(left.png); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position:left center;}

.cssplay_menu ul li b {display:block; width:100%; height:45px; background:transparent; position:relative; z-index:10;
-webkit-transition: 0s 0.5s;
transition: 0s 0.5s;
}
.cssplay_menu ul ul li b {margin-top:-45px;}

.cssplay_menu ul li b {*display:none;}

.cssplay_menu ul {background:#ccc;}

.cssplay_menu a {display:block; font:normal 14px "PT Sans", arial, sans-serif; color:#000; line-height:45px; text-decoration:none; padding:0 30px 0 10px;}
.cssplay_menu > ul > li > a {float:left; text-transform:uppercase;}

.cssplay_menu ul li:hover > ul {visibility:visible; left:-1px; top:45px; opacity:1;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul li:hover > ul {visibility:visible; left:100%; top:auto; margin-top:-46px;}
.cssplay_menu li.left:hover > ul {visibility:visible; left:auto; right:-1px; top:45px;}
.cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > ul {visibility:visible; left:auto; right:100%; top:auto; margin-top:-46px;}
.cssplay_menu ul li:hover > b {width:0;}

.cssplay_menu li.left ul a {text-align:right; padding:0 10px 0 30px;}

.cssplay_menu li:hover > a,
.cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > a {background-color:#bbb; text-decoration:underline;}

.backimage {display:block; width:100%; height:500px; background:url(ski.jpg) no-repeat center center; background-size:cover;}



@media only screen and (max-width:768px){
.cssplay_menu ul li b {display:none;}
.cssplay_menu {height:0; padding-top:45px; background:#bbb; position:relative;}
.cssplay_menu > label {display:block; width:36px; height:36px; background:#ddd; border-radius:5px; position:absolute; right:10px; top:5px; cursor:pointer;}
.cssplay_menu > label:before {display:block; content:""; width:18px; height:2px; background:#000; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; margin-left:-9px; margin-top:-1px;
-webkit-transition:0.25s;
transition:0.25s
}
.cssplay_menu > label:after {display:block; content:""; width:2px; height:18px; background:#000; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; margin-left:-1px; margin-top:-9px;
-webkit-transition:0.25s;
transition:0.25s
}
.cssplay_menu > span {display:block; font:normal 14px "PT Sans", arial,sans-serif; color:#000; position:absolute; left:10px; top:15px;}

.cssplay_menu li {display:block;}
.cssplay_menu ul, 
.cssplay_menu ul ul {margin:0; display:block; position:static; max-height:0; overflow:hidden;
-webkit-transition:0.25s;
transition:0.25s;
}
.cssplay_menu > ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:none;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:none;}
.cssplay_menu ul li.left ul > li.has-sub > a {background-image:none;}

.cssplay_menu ul li {float:none; display:block; position:relative;}
.cssplay_menu ul li label {display:block; width:36px; height:36px; background:#ddd; border-radius:5px; position:absolute; right:10px; top:5px; cursor:pointer;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul li label {margin-top:0;}

.cssplay_menu ul li label:before {display:block; content:""; width:18px; height:2px; background:#000; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; margin-left:-9px; margin-top:-1px;
-webkit-transition:0.25s;
transition:0.25s
}
.cssplay_menu ul li label:after {display:block; content:""; width:2px; height:18px; background:#000; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; margin-left:-1px; margin-top:-9px;
-webkit-transition:0.25s;
transition:0.25s
}

.cssplay_menu ul {background:#ccc; border:0;}

.cssplay_menu a {display:block; font:normal 14px arial,sans-serif; color:#000; line-height:45px; text-decoration:none;padding:0 20px 0 10px;}
.cssplay_menu ul li a {float:none; border-top:1px solid #aaa;}
.cssplay_menu ul ul li a:before {content:""; display:block; width:15px; height:45px; background:url(right.png) no-repeat left 15px; float:left;}

.cssplay_menu ul ul li > ul {margin-top:0;}
.cssplay_menu li.left ul li > ul {margin-top:0;}

.cssplay_menu ul ul li:hover > ul {margin-top:0;}
.cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > ul {margin-top:0;}

.cssplay_menu li.left ul a {text-align:left; padding:0 20px 0 10px;}

.cssplay_menu li:hover > a,
.cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > a {background-color:#ccc; text-decoration:none;}

.cssplay_menu input:checked ~ label:before {
-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);
transform:rotate(360deg);
}
.cssplay_menu input:checked ~ label:after {
-webkit-transform:rotate(270deg);
transform:rotate(270deg);
}

.cssplay_menu input:checked ~ ul {max-height:3000px;}

.cssplay_menu ul ul {border:0; margin:0 15px;}
}"},"t/css/droplist-menu.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    #
        # 
        # * css only - responsive click/tap action droplist menu
        # * (c) 2014 - CSSplay - Stu Nicholls
        # *
        # * http://www.cssplay.co.uk
        # *
        # 
    # defaults
    < html
        + body
        padding 0
        margin 0
    . content
        width 100%
        margin 0 auto
        max-width 1200px
    . content img
        width 100%
    . content h2
        padding 0 20px
        margin 0
        font normal 26px/50px 'texgyreadventorregular', 'lucida sans', arial, sans-serif
        color #069
    . content h3
        padding 0 20px
        margin 0
        font normal 22px/40px 'texgyreadventorregular', 'lucida sans', arial, sans-serif
        color #c60
    . content h5
        padding 0 20px
        margin 0
        font normal 12px/20px 'texgyreadventorregular', 'lucida sans', arial, sans-serif
        color #888
    . content p
        padding 5px 20px
        margin 0
        font normal 14px/18px 'texgyreadventorregular', 'lucida sans', arial, sans-serif
        color #666
    . content ol li
        padding 5px 0
        margin 0
        font normal 14px/18px 'texgyreadventorregular', 'lucida sans', arial, sans-serif
        color #888
    . content ol li a
        color #080
    # menu
    . nav input
        + #togglemenu
        position absolute
        left -9999px
        display none
    . nav label.togglemenu
        display none
    . nav
        width 100%
        max-width 1200px
        margin 50px auto 0 auto
    . nav ul
        position relative
        margin 0
        padding 0
        list-style none
        z-index 100
    . nav > ul > li
        float left
        max-width 180px
        margin 0 5px 0 0
    . nav > ul > li:before
        position relative
        top 10px
        left 10px
        content ""
        height 4px
        width 4px
        border 2px solid #666
        border-color transparent #666 #666 transparent
        float left
        margin 5px 0 0 0
        z-index 100
        transform rotate(45deg)
        -webkit-transform rotate(45deg)
        -ms-transform rotate(45deg)
    . nav ul > li > div
        display block
        position absolute
        top 87px
        left 0
        max-height 0
        width 100%
        overflow hidden
        background rgba(237,230,224,0.9)
        z-index 0
        transition 0.25s
        -webkit-transition 0.25s
    . nav ul > li > div ul
        display inline-block
        width 30%
        margin 0 2%
        padding 45px 0 30px 0
        vertical-align top
    . nav ul > li > div ul:last-child
        margin 0
    . nav ul li label
        display block
        font bold 15px/15px arial, sans-serif
        color #333
        padding 16px 30px
        cursor pointer
        position relative
        height 55px
        border-radius 10px 10px 0 0
    . nav ul li label.openmenu
        background rgba(217,210,204,0)
        transition 0.25s
        -webkit-transition 0.25s
    . nav ul li label.opentop
        background rgba(217,210,204,0)
        transition 0.5s
        -webkit-transition 0.5s
    . nav ul li label span
        display block
        font normal 12px/14px arial, sans-serif
        color #888
        margin 10px 0 0 0
        text-transform uppercase
    . nav ul li label.closetop
        width 100%
        padding 0
        height 75px
        margin-top -75px
        display none
    . nav #closemenu
        display none
        position fixed
        top 0
        left 0
        height 100%
        width 100%
        z-index 80
    . nav ul ul li
        padding 1px 0
        border-top 1px solid #aaa
    . nav ul ul li:last-child
        border-bottom 1px solid #aaa
    . nav ul ul li a
        display block
        font normal 12px/12px arial, sans-serif
        padding 10px 30px
        color #555 !important
        text-decoration none
        padding 6px 20px
    . nav ul ul li.noborder
        border 0
        padding 0
    . nav ul ul li.noborder img
        display block
        width 100%
    . nav ul ul li a img
        display block
        margin 0 auto
        border 0
    . nav ul ul li a:hover
        color #fff !important
        background rgb(167,160,154)
    . nav ul ul li.noborder a:hover
        background transparent
    . nav ul ul li.noborder a
        padding 0 0 5px 0
    . nav #p1:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(1) > div
        + .nav #p2:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(2) > div
        + .nav #p3:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(3) > div
        + .nav #p4:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > div
        max-height 500px
        z-index 1
        box-shadow 0 10px 8px -8px rgba(0,0,0,0.3)
        transition 0.25s 0.25s
        -webkit-transition 0.25s 0.25s
    . nav #p1:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(1) > label.opentop
        + .nav #p2:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(2) > label.opentop
        + .nav #p3:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(3) > label.opentop
        + .nav #p4:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > label.opentop
        background rgba(217,210,204,0.9)
    . nav #p1:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(1) .closetop
        + .nav #p2:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(2) .closetop
        + .nav #p3:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(3) .closetop
        + .nav #p4:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(4) .closetop
        + .nav #p1:checked ~ #closemenu
        + .nav #p2:checked ~ #closemenu
        + .nav #p3:checked ~ #closemenu
        + .nav #p4:checked ~ #closemenu
        display block
    media only screen and (max-width: 768px)
        . nav label
            display block
            cursor pointer
        . nav ul li label
            height auto
            border-radius 0
        . nav label.togglemenu
            float right
            display block
            cursor pointer
            position relative
            z-index 100
            font normal 22px/22px arial, sans-serif
            color #000
            margin 0 20px 20px 0
        . nav > ul
            max-height 0
            overflow hidden
            width 100%
            background #555
            padding 0
            clear both
            transition 0.5s
            -webkit-transition 0.5s
        . nav ul li label.closetop
            height 48px
            margin-top -48px
        . nav > ul > li:before
            border-color transparent #fff #fff transparent
        . nav ul li label.opentop
            color #fff
            border-top 1px solid #fff
            text-align left
        . nav ul li label span
            color #fff
            display inline
            margin-left 10px
        . nav > ul > li
            width 100%
            max-width 100%
            text-align center
        . nav ul > li > div
            position static
            padding 0
        . nav ul > li > div ul
            width 100%
            max-width 100%
            display block
            padding 0 0 0 10px
            margin 0
            background #333
        . nav ul div ul:last-child
            display none
        . nav #togglemenu:checked ~ ul
            max-height 700px
        . nav #p1:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(1) > label.opentop
            + .nav #p2:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(2) > label.opentop
            + .nav #p3:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(3) > label.opentop
            + .nav #p4:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > label.opentop
            background #333
        . nav ul ul li
            border 0
            padding 0
            text-align left
        . nav ul ul li:last-child
            border 0
        . nav ul ul li a
            display block
            padding 10px 20px
            color #fff !important
            background #555
            border-top 1px solid #ccc
        . nav ul ul li a:hover
            background #333
        . nav ul ul li.noborder a
            padding-top 5px
        . nav ul > li:nth-of-type(1) > div
            + .nav ul > li:nth-of-type(2) > div
            + .nav ul > li:nth-of-type(3) > div
            + .nav ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > div

        . nav #p1:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(1) > div
            + .nav #p2:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(2) > div
            + .nav #p3:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(3) > div
            + .nav #p4:checked ~ ul > li:nth-of-type(4) > div
            box-shadow none
            transition 1.5s
            -webkit-transition 1.5s"},"toIttf/file.html":{"type":"CODE","contents":"<div class="cssplay_menu"><span>MENU</span><input type="checkbox" id="sub0"><label for="sub0"></label>

    #
        # ================================================================
        # This copyright notice must be untouched at all times.
        # The original version of this stylesheet and the associated (x)html
        # is available at http://www.cssplay.co.uk/menus/cssplay-responsive-multi-level-menu-three.html
        # Copyright (c) Stu Nicholls. All rights reserved.
        # This stylesheet and the assocaited (x)html may be modified in any
        # way to fit your requirements.
        # ===================================================================
    . cssplay_menu
        width 100%
        background #ccc
        text-align center
        height 45px
        position relative
        z-index 100
    . cssplay_menu > span
        display none
    . cssplay_menu input
        position absolute
        display none
    . cssplay_menu label
        display none
    . cssplay_menu ul
        margin 0
        padding 0
        list-style none
        white-space nowrap
        text-align left
    . cssplay_menu ul
        display inline-block
    . cssplay_menu ul
        @ *display inline
    . cssplay_menu li
        margin 0
        padding 0
        list-style none
    . cssplay_menu li
        display inline-block
        display inline
    . cssplay_menu ul ul
        position absolute
        left -9999px
        border-left 1px solid #ddd
        border-right 1px solid #ddd
    . cssplay_menu > ul
        margin 0 auto
    . cssplay_menu > ul > li
        float left
        display block
        position relative
    . cssplay_menu ul ul li a
        border-top 1px solid #ddd
    . cssplay_menu > ul > li.has-sub > a
        background-image url(down.png)
        background-repeat no-repeat
        background-position right center
    . cssplay_menu ul ul > li.has-sub > a
        background-image url(right.png)
        background-repeat no-repeat
        background-position right center
    . cssplay_menu ul li.left ul > li.has-sub > a
        background-image url(left.png)
        background-repeat no-repeat
        background-position left center
    . cssplay_menu ul li b
        display block
        width 100%
        height 45px
        background transparent
        position relative
        z-index 10
        -webkit-transition 0s 0.5s
        transition 0s 0.5s
    . cssplay_menu ul ul li b
        margin-top -45px
    . cssplay_menu ul li b
        @ *display none
    . cssplay_menu ul
        background #ccc
    . cssplay_menu a
        display block
        font normal 14px "PT Sans", arial, sans-serif
        color #000
        line-height 45px
        text-decoration none
        padding 0 30px 0 10px
    . cssplay_menu > ul > li > a
        float left
        text-transform uppercase
    . cssplay_menu ul li:hover > ul
        visibility visible
        left -1px
        top 45px
        opacity 1
    . cssplay_menu ul ul li:hover > ul
        visibility visible
        left 100%
        top auto
        margin-top -46px
    . cssplay_menu li.left:hover > ul
        visibility visible
        left auto
        right -1px
        top 45px
    . cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > ul
        visibility visible
        left auto
        right 100%
        top auto
        margin-top -46px
    . cssplay_menu ul li:hover > b
        width 0
    . cssplay_menu li.left ul a
        text-align right
        padding 0 10px 0 30px
    . cssplay_menu li:hover > a
        + .cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > a
        background-color #bbb
        text-decoration underline
    . backimage
        display block
        width 100%
        height 500px
        background url(ski.jpg) no-repeat center center
        background-size cover
    media only screen and (max-width:768px)
        . cssplay_menu ul li b
            display none
        . cssplay_menu
            height 0
            padding-top 45px
            background #bbb
            position relative
        . cssplay_menu > label
            display block
            width 36px
            height 36px
            background #ddd
            border-radius 5px
            position absolute
            right 10px
            top 5px
            cursor pointer
        . cssplay_menu > label:before
            display block
            content ""
            width 18px
            height 2px
            background #000
            position absolute
            left 50%
            top 50%
            margin-left -9px
            margin-top -1px
            -webkit-transition 0.25s
            transition 0.25s
        . cssplay_menu > label:after
            display block
            content ""
            width 2px
            height 18px
            background #000
            position absolute
            left 50%
            top 50%
            margin-left -1px
            margin-top -9px
            -webkit-transition 0.25s
            transition 0.25s
        . cssplay_menu > span
            display block
            font normal 14px "PT Sans", arial,sans-serif
            color #000
            position absolute
            left 10px
            top 15px
        . cssplay_menu li
            display block
        . cssplay_menu ul
            + .cssplay_menu ul ul
            margin 0
            display block
            position static
            max-height 0
            overflow hidden
            -webkit-transition 0.25s
            transition 0.25s
        . cssplay_menu > ul > li.has-sub > a
            background-image none
        . cssplay_menu ul ul > li.has-sub > a
            background-image none
        . cssplay_menu ul li.left ul > li.has-sub > a
            background-image none
        . cssplay_menu ul li
            float none
            display block
            position relative
        . cssplay_menu ul li label
            display block
            width 36px
            height 36px
            background #ddd
            border-radius 5px
            position absolute
            right 10px
            top 5px
            cursor pointer
        . cssplay_menu ul ul li label
            margin-top 0
        . cssplay_menu ul li label:before
            display block
            content ""
            width 18px
            height 2px
            background #000
            position absolute
            left 50%
            top 50%
            margin-left -9px
            margin-top -1px
            -webkit-transition 0.25s
            transition 0.25s
        . cssplay_menu ul li label:after
            display block
            content ""
            width 2px
            height 18px
            background #000
            position absolute
            left 50%
            top 50%
            margin-left -1px
            margin-top -9px
            -webkit-transition 0.25s
            transition 0.25s
        . cssplay_menu ul
            background #ccc
            border 0
        . cssplay_menu a
            display block
            font normal 14px arial,sans-serif
            color #000
            line-height 45px
            text-decoration none
            padding 0 20px 0 10px
        . cssplay_menu ul li a
            float none
            border-top 1px solid #aaa
        . cssplay_menu ul ul li a:before
            content ""
            display block
            width 15px
            height 45px
            background url(right.png) no-repeat left 15px
            float left
        . cssplay_menu ul ul li > ul
            margin-top 0
        . cssplay_menu li.left ul li > ul
            margin-top 0
        . cssplay_menu ul ul li:hover > ul
            margin-top 0
        . cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > ul
            margin-top 0
        . cssplay_menu li.left ul a
            text-align left
            padding 0 20px 0 10px
        . cssplay_menu li:hover > a
            + .cssplay_menu li.left ul li:hover > a
            background-color #ccc
            text-decoration none
        . cssplay_menu input:checked ~ label:before
            -webkit-transform rotate(360deg)
            transform rotate(360deg)
        . cssplay_menu input:checked ~ label:after
            -webkit-transform rotate(270deg)
            transform rotate(270deg)
        . cssplay_menu input:checked ~ ul
            max-height 3000px
        . cssplay_menu ul ul
            border 0
            margin 0 15px"},"t/html/responsive-multi-level-menu-three.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":". cssplay_menu

"},"t/html/layouts/site-scripts.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
	$params &opt

    $$ $include v08/env/vars

    $
        var useReact = opt.useReact || opt.useMaterialUI;
        var useBabel = useReact || opt.useBabel;
        //

    $*
    FIREBASE MUST BE FIRST
    BABEL IS LAST
    *$

    $if opt.useFirebase
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase.js
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-app.js
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-auth.js
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-firestore.js
        $*
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-database.js
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-messaging.js
        js https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/5.8.1/firebase-functions.js
        *$
        script
            module
                kind es6
                # Initialize Firebase
                $if opt.project === 'wizzifactory'
                    var config
                        {
                            @ apiKey "${stfnbssl_env.firebaseApiKey}"
                            @ authDomain "wizzifactory.firebaseapp.com"
                            @ databaseURL "https://wizzifactory.firebaseio.com"
                            @ projectId "wizzifactory"
                            # NOT YET storageBucket "wizzifactory.appspot.com"
                            @ storageBucket "" 
                            @ messagingSenderId "676985835415"
                    _ firebase.initializeApp(config)
                    log 'firebase', firebase
                    var firestore = firebase.firestore();

    $if opt.useAce
        $if isWizziStudio
            $if opt.production
                j( /static/lib/ace/src-min-noconflict/ace.js
            $else
                j( /static/lib/ace/src-noconflict/ace.js
        $else
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ace/1.4.2/ace.js

	$if opt.useBootstrap
		j( /static/lib/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js
    
    $if opt.useEventEmitter
        j( https://unpkg.com/eventemitter3@latest/umd/eventemitter3.min.js

    $if opt.useCodemirror
        j( /static/lib/codemirror/lib/codemirror.js
        j( /static/lib/codemirror/mode/javascript/javascript.js
        j( /static/lib/codemirror/mode/xml/xml.js
        j( /static/lib/codemirror/theme/monokai.css
        j( /static/lib/codemirror/theme/twilight.css

    $if opt.useDeepDiff
        $if isWizziStudio
            j( /static/lib/flitbit/deep-diff.min.js
        $else
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/deep-diff/0.3.3/deep-diff.min.js

    $if opt.useKeycode
        $if isWizziStudio
            j( /static/lib/material-ui/keycode.min.2.2.0.js
        $else
            $$ j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/keycode@2.2.0/index.min.js
            j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/keycode.js

    $if opt.useHighlight
        $if isWizziStudio
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.13.1/highlight.min.js
            $$ j( /static/lib/highlight/highlight.pack.js
        $else	   
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.13.1/highlight.min.js

    $if opt.useInteractJs
        j( /static/lib/interactjs/interact.js

    $if opt.useJarallax
        j( /static/lib/object-fit-images/ofi.min.js
        $if opt.production
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax.min.js
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax-video.min.js
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax-element.min.js
        $else
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax.js
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax-video.js
            j( /static/lib/jarallax/jarallax-element.js

    $if opt.useJQuery || opt.useBootstrap
        $if opt.production
            j( /static/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js
        $else
            j( /static/lib/jquery/jquery.js

    $if opt.useJsonFormatter
        $if isWizziStudio
            j( /static/lib/json-formatter/json-formatter.js
        $else	     
            j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/json-formatter-js@2.2.1/dist/json-formatter.min.js

	$if opt.useJss
        js /static/lib/jss/jss.js
		js /static/lib/jss/jss-preset-default.js

    $if opt.useMarkdown
        j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/marked/marked.min.js

    $if opt.useMathJax
        j( https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-MML-AM_CHTML

    $if opt.usePopper
        j( /static/lib/popper/popper.js

	$if opt.usePrism
		$if isWizziStudio
		    js /static/lib/prism/prism.js
		$else
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.6.0/prism.min.js		

    $if opt.usePubSub
        js /static/lib/pubsub/pubsub.js

    $if useReact
        $if opt.production
            j( https://unpkg.com/prop-types@15.8.1/prop-types.min.js
        $else
            j( https://unpkg.com/prop-types@15.8.1/prop-types.js

        $if opt.useReactLatest
            $if opt.production
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.production.min.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.production.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@latest/umd/react.development.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.development.js
        $else
            $if opt.production
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.production.min.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18.2.0/umd/react-dom.production.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.development.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18.2.0/umd/react-dom.development.js

        $if opt.useClassNames
            j( /static/lib/react/classnames.js

        $if opt.useMaterialUI
            $if opt.materialUI.latest
                $if opt.production
                    j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@latest/umd/material-ui.production.min.js
                $else
                    j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@latest/umd/material-ui.development.js
            $else
                $if opt.production
                    $if opt.materialUI.v4
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@material-ui/core@4.12.4/umd/material-ui.development.min.js
                    $else
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@5.8.7/umd/material-ui.production.min.js
                $else
                    $if opt.materialUI.v4
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@material-ui/core@4.12.4/umd/material-ui.development.js
                    $else
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@5.8.7/umd/material-ui.development.js
        $if opt.useRouter
            $if opt.local || isWizziStudio
                j( /static/lib/react/react-router.min.4.3.1.js
            $else
                $if opt.useRouterLatest
                    j( https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom@latest/umd/react-router-dom.js
                $else
                    j( https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom@4.3.1/umd/react-router-dom.js

        $if opt.useReactGrid
            j( /static/lib/react/react-grid-layout.min.js

        $if opt.useDownshift
            $if opt.local || isWizziStudio
                $$ j( /static/lib/react/downshift.umd.min.2.0.10.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/downshift@6.1.7/dist/downshift.umd.js
            $else
                j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/downshift@2.0.10/dist/downshift.umd.min.js


        $if opt.useGridLayout
            $if opt.useGridLayoutLatest
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-grid-layout@latest/dist/react-grid-layout.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-grid-layout@1.3.4/dist/react-grid-layout.min.js

        $if opt.react.useStyledComponents
            js //unpkg.com/styled-components@4.0.1/dist/styled-components.min.js
        
        $if opt.react.useTransitionGroup
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/react-transition-group/4.4.1/react-transition-group.min.js

    
    $if opt.useRxJs
        j( /static/lib/rxjs/rxjs.umd.min.js
        
    $if opt.useScrollReveal
        j( /static/lib/scrollreveal/scrollreveal.js

	$if opt.useSplit
		js /static/lib/controls/split.js
	
    $if opt.useSweetalert
	    j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@7.31.1/dist/sweetalert2.all.min.js
	
    $if opt.useUnderscore
        $if opt.production
            j( /static/lib/underscore/underscore.min.js
        $else
            j( /static/lib/underscore/underscore.js
    
    $if opt.useVue
		j( https://unpkg.com/vue

	$if opt.useWizzi
	    $if isWizziStudio
		    j( /static/wizzi-play/scripts/wizzi.standalone.js
        $else		  
            j( /scripts/wizzi.standalone.js	

	$if opt.useMathJax
        script
            # 
                _ MathJax.Hub.Config
                    {
                        @ tex2jax
                            {
                                @ inlineMath [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']]
                                @ processEscapes true
    
    $if useBabel
        j( https://unpkg.com/babel-standalone@latest/babel.min.js

    $if opt.useMonaco
        $$ j( /static/lib/monaco-editor/min/vs/loader.js

    $if opt.mainJs && opt.mainJs.length > 0
        $if useBabel
            script
                src ${opt.mainJs}
                type text/babel         
        $else
            js ${opt.mainJs}


"},"t/html/layouts/site.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &opt
    $
        var ca = 'm-s p-s color-header font-l font-w-xxl';
        var ca_inverse = 'm-s p-s color-header-inverse bg-color-header-inverse font-l font-w-xxl';
        var ca2 = 'color-header font-x font-w-s';
        //
    head
        $if opt.title
            @title ${opt.title}
        meta
            charset utf-8
        meta
            name viewport
            content width=device-width, initial-scale=1
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.googleapis.com
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.gstatic.com
            crossorigin
        link
            @ rel "stylesheet"
            @ href "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/normalize.css@8.0.1/normalize.min.css"
        css /ittf/css/main.css.ittf
        script
            module
                set window.__filename = 'browser'
                $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
                    var WizziBrowser
                        {
                            @ log
                                function
                                    var line
                                        _ Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments).map
                                            function
                                                param argument
                                                return
                                                    iif typeof argument === 'string'
                                                        then argument
                                                        else JSON.stringify(argument)
                                            ._ join
                                                @ '\n '
                                    if arguments.length > 1 && arguments[arguments.length-1] === '-'
                                        set line += new Array(50).join('-')
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent += line + '\n'
                            @ clearLog
                                function
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent = ''
                            @ setStatus
                                function
                                    param status
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-status').textContent = status
                            @ setContent
                                function
                                    param newContent
                                    var content = document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-content')
                                    while content.hasChildNodes()
                                        _ content.removeChild(content.lastChild)
                                    _ content.appendChild(newContent)
        $hook head-styles-0
        $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
            @style
                css
                    # wizzi-browser-status
                        margin .5em 0
                        font-style italic
                    # wizzi-browser-log
                        margin .5em 0
                        white-space pre-wrap
                    # wizzi-browser-content
                        margin .5em 0
                    # status:empty, #log:empty, #content:empty
                        display none
        ./site-styles( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            style
                # ${opt.stickyNav}.sticky
                    position fixed
                    top 0
                . ${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin
                    padding-top ${opt.stickyNavOffset}px
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.visible
                        display block
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.hidden
                        display none
        $hook head-styles
        $hook head-styles-2
        $hook head-styles-3
        $hook head-scripts
    body
        . flex-row space-between bg-color-header color-header align-items-center
            id __main_navbar
            . flex-row
                a( , /, ${ca2}
                    div
                        style width: 80px; margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;
                        images/logo(#efefef, #434343)
            . flex-row
                $if locals.user
                    $if opt.section != 'Starter'
                        a( Starter, /ittf/site/starter.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Starter
                    $if opt.section != 'Lab'
                        a( Lab, /ittf/site/lab.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Lab
                    $if opt.section != 'Productions'
                        a( Productions, /ittf/site/productions.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Productions
                    $if opt.section != 'Project'
                        a( Project, /ittf/site/project.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Project
            . flex-row
                $if opt.section != 'Docs'
                    a( Docs, /ittf/site/docs/concepts/overview.html.ittf, ${ca}
                $else
                    . ${ca_inverse}
                        + Docs
                a( Github, https://github.com/stfnbssl/wizzi, ${ca}
            . flex-row m-r-x
                $if locals.user
                    a( Profile, /account/profile, ${ca}
                    a( Log Out, /auth/logout, ${ca}
                $else
                    a( Log In, /auth/login, ${ca}
        $hook
        $hook body-scripts-0
        $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
            div
                # wizzi-browser-status
                # wizzi-browser-log
                # wizzi-browser-content
        ./site-scripts( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            script
                let header = document.getElementById("__main_navbar")
                let stickyBar = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNav}")
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    let stickyLogo = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNavLogo}")
                let stickyPos = ${opt.stickyNavOffset}
                _ window.addEventListener
                    @ "scroll"
                    =>
                        param e
                        let scrollPos = window.scrollY
                        log 'pre sticki', stickyPos, scrollPos, scrollPos > stickyPos
                        if scrollPos > stickyPos
                            _ stickyBar.classList.add('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.add('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('hidden')
                            log 'sticki', scrollPos
                        else
                            _ stickyBar.classList.remove('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.remove('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('hidden')
        $hook body-scripts
        $hook body-scripts-2
        $hook body-scripts-3
        $if opt.useHighlight
            script
                _ document.addEventListener
                    @ 'DOMContentLoaded'
                    =>
                        param event
                        _ document.querySelectorAll
                            @ 'pre .hljs'
                            ._ forEach
                                =>
                                    param block
                                    _ hljs.highlightBlock(block)
"},"t/html/layouts/site-styles.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

    $if opt.useBootstrap

    $if opt.useCodemirror

        s( ${opt.mainCss}
"},"t/html/models/docs/wzctx.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $global
        var wzCtx = {
            name: "stfnbssl.github.io/wizzi",
            version: "0.7.1",
            description: "Wizzi github page",

                    {

                    {

                    },
                    {
