"},"t/html/layouts/basic.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &opt
    $
        //
    head
        $if opt.title
            @title ${opt.title}
        meta
            charset utf-8
        meta
            name viewport
            content width=device-width, initial-scale=1
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.googleapis.com
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.gstatic.com
            crossorigin
        link
            @ rel "stylesheet"
            @ href "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/normalize.css@8.0.1/normalize.min.css"
        script
            module
                set window.__filename = 'browser'
                $if opt.useWizziBrowser
                    var WizziBrowser
                        {
                            @ log
                                function
                                    var line
                                        _ Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments).map
                                            function
                                                param argument
                                                return
                                                    iif typeof argument === 'string'
                                                        then argument
                                                        else JSON.stringify(argument)
                                            ._ join
                                                @ '\n '
                                    if arguments.length > 1 && arguments[arguments.length-1] === '-'
                                        set line += new Array(50).join('-')
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent += line + '\n'
                            @ clearLog
                                function
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent = ''
                            @ setStatus
                                function
                                    param status
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-status').textContent = status
                            @ setContent
                                function
                                    param newContent
                                    var content = document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-content')
                                    while content.hasChildNodes()
                                        _ content.removeChild(content.lastChild)
                                    _ content.appendChild(newContent)
        $hook head-styles-0
        $if opt.useWizziBrowser
            @style
                css
                    # wizzi-browser-status
                        margin .5em 0
                        font-style italic
                    # wizzi-browser-log
                        margin .5em 0
                        white-space pre-wrap
                    # wizzi-browser-content
                        margin .5em 0
                    # status:empty, #log:empty, #content:empty
                        display none
        ./site-styles( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            style
                # ${opt.stickyNav}.sticky
                    position fixed
                    top 0
                . ${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin
                    padding-top ${opt.stickyNavOffset}px
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.visible
                        display block
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.hidden
                        display none
        $hook head-styles
        $hook head-styles-1
        $hook head-scripts
    body
        $hook body-scripts-0
        $if opt.useWizziBrowser
            div
                # wizzi-browser-status
                # wizzi-browser-log
                # wizzi-browser-content
        ./site-scripts( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            script
                let header = document.getElementById("__main_navbar")
                let stickyBar = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNav}")
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    let stickyLogo = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNavLogo}")
                let stickyPos = ${opt.stickyNavOffset}
                _ window.addEventListener
                    @ "scroll"
                    =>
                        param e
                        let scrollPos = window.scrollY
                        log 'pre sticki', stickyPos, scrollPos, scrollPos > stickyPos
                        if scrollPos > stickyPos
                            _ stickyBar.classList.add('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.add('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('hidden')
                            log 'sticki', scrollPos
                        else
                            _ stickyBar.classList.remove('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.remove('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('hidden')
        $hook body-scripts
        $hook body-scripts-1
        $if opt.useHighlight
            script
                _ document.addEventListener
                    @ 'DOMContentLoaded'
                    =>
                        param event
                        _ document.querySelectorAll
                            @ 'pre .hljs'
                            ._ forEach
                                =>
                                    param block
                                    _ hljs.highlightBlock(block)
"},"t/a_cb_no_err.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        $hook
"},"t/j.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params url
    script
        src ${url}
        crossorigin anonymous
"},"t/s.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params url
    link
        href ${url}
        rel stylesheet
"},"t/js_wz.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params url
    $if isWizziStudio
        script
            src ${url}.ittf
            crossorigin anonymous
    $else
        script
            src ${url}
            crossorigin anonymous
"},"t/r_cb.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|@@null
    return
        _ callback
            @ null
            $if result !== null
                @ ${result}
            $hook
"},"t/f_cb.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    function
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            return
                _ callback
                    @ err
        $hook
"},"t/f_cb_throw.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    function
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            log 'err', err
            throw err
        $hook
"},"t/f_cb_no_err.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    function
        param err
        param ${result}
        $hook
"},"t/css_wz.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params url
    $if isWizziStudio
        link
            href ${url}.ittf
            rel stylesheet
    $else
        link
            href ${url}
            rel stylesheet
"},"t/a.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params text, href|#, ca|@@null
    a ${text}
        href ${href}
        $if ca
            class ${ca}
        $hook
"},"t/a_cb.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            return
                _ callback
                    @ err
        $hook
"},"t/a_cb_throw.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            log 'err', err
            throw err
        $hook
"},"t/html/forms/inject_styles.js.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

    function inject_form_styles

        _ styles.InjectCss.addText
            {
                # ==========================================================================
                # FORM
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".form-card"
                    @ "padding" "30px"
                    @ border "1px solid #ebebeb"
                { ".form-title"
                    @ "font-size" "30px"
                    @ "font-weight" "700"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "20px"
                # ==========================================================================
                # Control
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".control-group"
                    @ "width" "100%"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "5px"
                { ".single-control"
                    @ "width" "100%"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "5px"
                { ".control-label"
                    @ "font-weight" "bold"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "7px"
                    @ "text-transform" "uppercase"
                { ".control-error"
                    @ "font-size" "12px"
                    @ "color" "red"
                # ==========================================================================
                # Label
                # ==========================================================================
                { "label.required"
                    @ "position" "relative"
                { "label.required:after"
                    @ "content" "'*'"
                    @ "margin-left" "2px"
                    @ color "#b90000"
                # ==========================================================================
                # GRID
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".grid-row-2"
                    @ display "grid"
                    @ "grid-template-columns" "1fr 1fr"
                { ".grid-row-3"
                    @ display "grid"
                    @ "grid-template-columns" "1fr 1fr 1fr"
                { ".input-group"
                    @ position "relative"
                    @ "width" "100%"
                    $if md.hasBorderedControls
                        @ "margin-bottom" "2px"
                        @ "padding-bottom" "12px"
                    $else
                        @ "margin-bottom" "12px"
                        @ "padding-bottom" "22px"
                        @ "border-bottom" "1px solid #e5e5e5"
                # ==========================================================================
                # BUTTON
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".btn"
                    @ "line-height" "40px"
                    @ display "inline-block"
                    @ padding "0 25px"
                    @ cursor "pointer"
                    @ color "#fff"
                    @ "font-family" '"Roboto", "Arial", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif'
                    @ "-webkit-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "-o-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "-moz-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "font-size" "14px"
                    @ "font-weight" "700"
                { ".btn--radius"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "border-radius" "3px"
                { ".btn--green"
                    @ background "#57b846"
                { ".btn--green:hover"
                    @ background "#4dae3c"
                # ==========================================================================
                # Input
                # ==========================================================================
                { input
                    $if md.hasBorderedControls
                        @ "box-sizing" "border-box"
                        @ border "1px solid #ebebeb"
                        @ padding "14px 20px"
                        @ "border-radius" "5px"
                        @ "-moz-border-radius" "5px"
                        @ "-webkit-border-radius" "5px"
                        @ "-o-border-radius" "5px"
                        @ "-ms-border-radius" "5px"
                    $else
                        @ outline "none"
                        @ margin 0
                        @ border "none"
                        @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "none"
                        @ "-moz-box-shadow" "none"
                        @ "box-shadow" "none"
                    $$ @ "width" "100%"
                    @ "font-size" "14px"
                    @ "font-family" "inherit"
                $if md.hasBorderedControls
                    { "input:focus"
                        @ border "1px solid #009e00"
                    { "input.error"
                        @ border "1px solid #c70000"
                { ".input-icon"
                    @ position "absolute"
                    @ "font-size" "18px"
                    @ "color" "#ccc"
                    @ "right" "8px"
                    @ "top" "50%"
                    @ "-webkit-transform" "translateY(-50%)"
                    @ "-moz-transform" "translateY(-50%)"
                    @ "-ms-transform" "translateY(-50%)"
                    @ "-o-transform" "translateY(-50%)"
                    @ "transform" "translateY(-50%)"
                    @ "cursor" "pointer"
                { ".input--style-2"
                    $if !md.hasBorderedControls
                        @ padding "9px 0"
                    @ color "#666"
                    @ "font-size" "16px"
                    @ "font-weight" "500"
                { ".input--style-2::-webkit-input-placeholder"
                    $$ /* WebKit, Blink, Edge */
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ opacity .4
                { ".input--style-2:-moz-placeholder"
                    $$ /* Mozilla Firefox 4 to 18 */
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ opacity .4
                { ".input--style-2::-moz-placeholder"
                    $$ /* Mozilla Firefox 19+ */
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ opacity .4
                { ".input--style-2:-ms-input-placeholder"
                    $$ /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ opacity .4
                { ".input--style-2:-ms-input-placeholder"
                    $$ /* Microsoft Edge */
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ opacity .4
                # ==========================================================================
                # DATE PICKER
                # ==========================================================================
                { "td.active"
                    @ "background-color" "#2c6ed5"
                { 'input[type="date" i]'
                    @ padding "14px"
                { ".table-condensed td, .table-condensed th"
                    @ "font-size" "14px"
                    @ "font-family" '"Roboto", "Arial", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif'
                    @ "font-weight" "400"
                { ".daterangepicker td"
                    @ width "40px"
                    @ height "30px"
                { ".daterangepicker"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "-moz-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ display "none"
                    @ border "1px solid #e0e0e0"
                    @ "margin-top" "5px"
                { ".daterangepicker::after, .daterangepicker::before"
                    @ display "none"
                { ".daterangepicker thead tr th"
                    @ padding "10px 0"
                { ".daterangepicker .table-condensed th select"
                    @ border "1px solid #ccc"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "font-size" "14px"
                    @ "padding" "5px"
                    @ "outline" "none"
                # =========================================================================
                # SELECT2
                # =========================================================================
                { ".select--no-search .select2-search"
                    @ display "none !important"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container"
                    @ width "100% !important"
                    $if md.hasBorderedControls
                        @ border "1px solid #ebebeb"
                    $else
                        @ outline "none"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container .select2-selection--single"
                    @ outline "none"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ height "36px"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__rendered"
                    @ "line-height" "36px"
                    @ "padding-left" 0
                    @ color "#808080"
                    @ "font-size" "16px"
                    @ "font-family" "inherit"
                    @ "font-weight" 500
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__arrow"
                    @ height "34px"
                    @ right  "4px"
                    @ display "-webkit-box"
                    @ display "-webkit-flex"
                    @ display "-moz-box"
                    @ display "-ms-flexbox"
                    @ display "flex"
                    @ "-webkit-box-pack" "center"
                    @ "-webkit-justify-content" "center"
                    @ "-moz-box-pack" "center"
                    @ "-ms-flex-pack" "center"
                    @ "justify-content" "center"
                    @ "-webkit-box-align" "center"
                    @ "-webkit-align-items" "center"
                    @ "-moz-box-align" "center"
                    @ "-ms-flex-align" "center"
                    @ "align-items" "center"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__arrow b"
                    @ "display" "none"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__arrow:after"
                    @ "font-family" "Material-Design-Iconic-Font"
                    @ content "'\f2f9'"
                    @ "font-size" "18px"
                    @ color "#ccc"
                    @ "-webkit-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "-o-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ "-moz-transition" "all 0.4s ease"
                    @ transition "all 0.4s ease"
                { ".rs-select2 .select2-container.select2-container--open .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__arrow::after"
                    @ "-webkit-transform" "rotate(-180deg)"
                    @ "-moz-transform" "rotate(-180deg)"
                    @ "-ms-transform" "rotate(-180deg)"
                    @ "-o-transform" "rotate(-180deg)"
                    @ transform "rotate(-180deg)"
                { ".select2-container--open .select2-dropdown--below"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "-moz-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ border "1px solid #e0e0e0"
                    @ "margin-top" "5px"
                    @ overflow "hidden"
                # ==========================================================================
                # CHECKBOX
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".checkbox-item"
                    @ "padding-left" "30px"
                    @ "padding-bottom" "10px"
                    @ "padding-top" "12px"
                # ==========================================================================
                # RADIO
                # ==========================================================================
                { ".radio-group"
                    @ display "flex"
                    @ "padding-bottom" "10px"
                    @ "padding-top" "12px"
                { ".radio-item"
                    @ position "relative"
                    @ display "grid"
                    @ "grid-template-columns" "1fr 3fr"
                    @ "margin-right" "30px"
                { ".radio-item label"
                    @ "font-weight" 500
                    @ "padding-left" "10px"
                    @ position "relative"
                    @ "z-index" 9
                    @ display "block"
                    @ cursor "pointer"
                    @ "text-transform" "none"
                $*
                { "input[type=radio]"
                    @ position "absolute"
                    @ appearance "radio !important"
                    @ "-moz-appearance" "radio !important"
                    @ "-webkit-appearance" "radio !important"
                    @ "-o-appearance" "radio !important"
                    @ "-ms-appearance" "radio !important"
                *$
                { ".form-radio input"
                    @ width "auto"
                    @ display "inline-block"
                # ==========================================================================
                # SLIDER
                # ========================================================================== 
                { ".slider-group"
                    @ position "relative"
                    @ "margin-top" "22px"
                { ".slider-item"
                    @ height "5px"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ "box-shadow" "none"
                    @ "-moz-box-shadow" "none"
                    @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "none"
                    @ "-o-box-shadow" "none"
                    @ "-ms-box-shadow" "none"
                    @ background "#f8f8f8"
                    @ "border-radius" "2.5px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "2.5px"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "2.5px"
                    @ "-o-border-radius" "2.5px"
                    @ "-ms-border-radius" "2.5px"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-connect"
                    @ background "#329e5e"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-handle"
                    @ width "100px"
                    @ height "30px"
                    @ top "-12px"
                    @ background "#329e5e"
                    @ "box-shadow" "0px 3px 2.85px 0.15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"
                    @ "-moz-box-shadow" "0px 3px 2.85px 0.15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"
                    @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "0px 3px 2.85px 0.15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"
                    @ "-o-box-shadow" "0px 3px 2.85px 0.15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"
                    @ "-ms-box-shadow" "0px 3px 2.85px 0.15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)"
                    @ "border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-o-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-ms-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ outline "none"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ right "-50px"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-handle:after, .slider-item .noUi-handle:before"
                    @ background "transparent"
                    @ height "0px"
                    @ width "20px"
                    @ top "-2px"
                    @ "font-size" "18px"
                    @ outline "none"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-handle:before"
                    @ "font-family" "Material-Design-Iconic-Font"
                    @ color "#fff"
                    @ content "'\f2fa'"
                    @ left "10px"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-handle:after"
                    @ "font-family" "'Material-Design-Iconic-Font'"
                    @ color "#fff"
                    @ content "'\f2fb'"
                    @ left "auto"
                    @ right "-5px"
                { ".slider-item .noUi-handle .noUi-tooltip"
                    @ bottom "2px"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ background "transparent"
                    @ "font-weight" "bold"
                    @ color "#fff"
                    @ padding "0px"
                { ".donate-us"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "93px"
                    @ "margin-top" "30px"
                { ".donate-us label"
                    @ "margin-bottom" "32px"
                { ".price_slider"
                    @ position "relative"
                { ".donate-value"
                    @ position "absolute"
                    @ top "-9px"
                    @ left "50%"
                    @ "z-index" "99"
                    @ transform "translateX(-50%)"
                    @ "-moz-transform" "translateX(-50%)"
                    @ "-webkit-transform" "translateX(-50%)"
                    @ "-o-transform" "translateX(-50%)"
                    @ "-ms-transform" "translateX(-50%)"
                # ==========================================================================
                # CODEMIRROR
                # ========================================================================== 
                { ".CodeMirror"
                    @ "font-size" "15px"
                    $$ @ width "30rem"
                    $$ @ height "100%"
                    @ border "1px solid #eee"
                    $$ @ height "auto"
                    @ height "20rem"
                # ==========================================================================
                # SUBMIT
                # ========================================================================== 
                { ".form-submit"
                    @ "text-align" "right"
                { ".submit"
                    @ width "150px"
                    @ height "50px"
                    @ display "inline-block"
                    @ "font-family" "'Poppins'"
                    @ "font-weight" "bold"
                    @ "font-size" "14px"
                    @ padding "10px"
                    @ border "none"
                    @ cursor "pointer"
                    @ "text-transform" "uppercase"
                    @ "border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-o-border-radius" "5px"
                    @ "-ms-border-radius" "5px"
                { "#reset"
                    @ background "#fff"
                    @ color "#999"
                    @ border "2px solid #ebebeb"
                { "#reset:hover"
                    @ border "2px solid #329e5e"
                    @ background "#329e5e"
                    @ color "#fff"
                { "#submit"
                    @ background "#329e5e"
                    @ color "#fff"
                    @ "margin-right" "25px"
                { "#submit:hover"
                    @ "background-color" "#267747"
                # ==========================================================================
                # TITLE
                # ========================================================================== 
                { ".title"
                    @ "text-transform" "uppercase"
                    @ "font-weight" 700
                    @ "margin-bottom" "37px"
                # ==========================================================================
                # CARD
                # ========================================================================== 
                { ".card"
                    @ overflow "hidden"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "3px"
                    @ "border-radius" "3px"
                    @ background "#fff"
                { ".card-2"
                    @ "-webkit-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "-moz-box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "box-shadow" "0px 8px 20px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"
                    @ "-webkit-border-radius" "10px"
                    @ "-moz-border-radius" "10px"
                    @ "border-radius" "10px"
                    @ "width" "100%"
                    @ display "table"
                { ".card-2 .card-heading"
                    @ background 'url("./images/stefano_stop.jpg") top left/cover no-repeat'
                    @ width "24.1%"
                    @ display "table-cell"
                { ".card-2 .card-body"
                    @ display "table-cell"
                    @ padding "80px 90px"
                    @ "padding-bottom" "88px"
                $*
                { "@media (max-width: 767px)"
                    { ".card-2"
                        @ display "block"
                    { ".card-2 .card-heading"
                        @ width  "100%"
                        @ display "block"
                        @ "padding-top" "300px"
                        @ "background-position" "left center"
                    { ".card-2 .card-body"
                        @ display "block"
                        @ padding "60px 50px"
                        *$

"},"t/html/images/goback.svg.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"svg

{"t/a_cb.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            return
                _ callback
                    @ err
        $hook
"},"t/a.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params text, href|#, ca|@@null
    a ${text}
        href ${href}
        $if ca
            class ${ca}
        $hook
"},"t/a_cb_no_err.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        $hook
"},"t/a_cb_throw.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params result|notUsed
    =>
        param err
        param ${result}
        if err
            log 'err', err
            throw err
        $hook
"},"t/css_wz.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

    $else

            href ${url}

"},"t/event_emit.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

"},"t/wfjobs.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params name, &jobCtx, ext|@@null
    $if name == 'any_js'
        artifact any_js
            src ./**/*.js.ittf
            schema js
            generator js/module
            extension js
            ignore /**/bin/**/*.js
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_ts'
        artifact any_ts
            src ./**/*.ts.ittf
            schema ts
            generator ts/module
            extension ts
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_tsx'
        artifact any_tsx
            src ./**/*.tsx.ittf
            schema ts
            generator ts/module
            extension tsx
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_css'
        artifact any_css
            src ./**/*.css.ittf
            schema css
            generator css/document
            extension css
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_svg'
        artifact any_svg
            src ./**/*.svg.ittf
            schema svg
            generator svg/document
            extension svg
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_html'
        artifact any_html
            src ./**/*.html.ittf
            schema html
            generator html/document
            extension html
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_json'
        artifact any_json
            src ./**/*.json.ittf
            schema json
            generator json/document
            extension json
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_xml'
        artifact any_xml
            src ./**/*.xml.ittf
            schema xml
            generator xml/document
            extension xml
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_yml'
        artifact any_yml
            src ./**/*.yml.ittf
            schema yaml
            generator yaml/document
            extension yml
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_yaml'
        artifact any_yaml
            src ./**/*.yaml.ittf
            schema yaml
            generator yaml/document
            extension yaml
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_md'
        artifact any_md
            src ./**/*.md.ittf
            schema md
            generator md/document
            extension md
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_text'
        artifact any_text
            src ./**/*.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            extension text
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_text_no_extension'
        artifact any_text
            src ./**/*.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            extension @@null
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_ittf'
        artifact any_ittf
            src ./**/*.ittf.ittf
            schema ittf
            generator ittf/document
            extension ittf
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.env'
        artifact .env
            src .env.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .env
            extension env
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'www'
        artifact www
            src bin/www.js.ittf
            schema js
            generator js/module
            dest-path bin/www
            extension
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.babelrc'
        artifact .babelrc
            src .babelrc.json.ittf
            schema json
            generator json/document
            dest-path .babelrc
            extension babelrc
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.gitignore'
        artifact .gitignore
            src .gitignore.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .gitignore
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.prettierrc'
        artifact .prettierrc
            src .prettierrc.json.ittf
            schema json
            generator json/document
            dest-path .prettierrc.json
            extension json
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.prettierignore'
        artifact .prettierignore
            src .prettierignore.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .prettierignore
            extension text
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.eslintrc'
        artifact .eslintrc
            src .eslintrc.js.ittf
            schema js
            generator js/module
            dest-path .eslintrc.js
            extension js
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.eslintignore'
        artifact .eslintignore
            src .eslintignore.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .eslintignore
            extension text
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.npmignore'
        artifact .npmignore
            src .npmignore.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .npmignore
            extension text
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'Procfile'
        artifact Procfile
            src Procfile.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path Procfile
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == '.azure_deployment'
        artifact .azure_deployment
            src .deployment.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path .deployment
            extension text
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'server.cert'
        artifact server.cert
            src server.cert.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path server.cert
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'server.key'
        artifact server.key
            src server.key.text.ittf
            schema text
            generator text/document
            dest-path server.key
            $if jobCtx.job_model
                model-ref ${jobCtx.job_model}
                    export-name ${jobCtx.job_model}
            $hook
    $elif name == 'any_plain'
        artifact any_plain_${ext}
            src ./**/*.${ext}
            extension ${ext}
    $elif name == 'any_plain_image'
        artifact any_plain_jpeg
            src ./**/*.jpeg
            extension jpeg
        artifact any_plain_jpg
            src ./**/*.jpg
            extension jpg
        artifact any_plain_gif
            src ./**/*.gif
            extension gif
        artifact any_plain_png
            src ./**/*.png
            extension png
        artifact any_plain_bmp
            src ./**/*.bmp
            extension bmp
        artifact any_plain_svg
            src ./**/*.svg
            extension svg
    $else
        $throw wfjob name not managed: ${name}
"},"t/css/ace-edit-browse.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh

	# snippet-source-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh

	# snippet-result-editor
		height 100% !important
		width 100% !important
        max-height 41vh"},"t/css/tree-node.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. tree-node
        position relative
		font-size 13px
		line-height 1.8
		. copying
			border 1px dashed #dedede
		. cutting
			border 1px dashed #dedede
			opacity 0.5
		. icon-item-group
			position relative !important
			display inline-block !important
			width 100% !important
			cursor pointer !important
			z-index 1 !important
			white-space nowrap !important
			outline 0px !important
			padding 0px 16px !important
		. item-name
			vertical-align -1px !important
			user-select none !important
			margin 0px 6px !important
    
	. tree-node .tree-child-leaves
        display block
        margin-left 15px
    
	. tree-node .hidden
        display none
    
	. tree-node .tree-expando
        background #ddd
        border-radius 3px
        cursor pointer
        float left
        height 10px
        line-height 10px
        position relative
        text-align center
        top 5px
        width 10px
    
	. tree-node .hidden
        visibility hidden
    
	. tree-node .tree-expando:hover
        background #aaa
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-text
        cursor pointer
        float left
        margin-left 5px
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-text:hover
        color blue
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-content
		display flex
		flex-direction row
		& :hover
			background #dedede

	. tree-node-context-menu-on
		background #cdcdcd
	
	$*
	. tree-node .tree-node-content:before
        + .tree-node .tree-node-content:after
        content " "
        display table
    
	. tree-node .tree-node-content:after
        clear both
	*$
"},"t/css/splash.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

	. splash-editor
		height 100%
		width 100%
		background-color rgb(230, 230, 230) !important

		height 100%
		width 100%
		background-color rgb(230, 230, 230) !important"},"t/css/widgets/file-explorer.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

        opacity 0.7 !important"},"t/css/widgets/tree-node.css.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group

"},"t/images/logo.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"svg
    $params color|#000, bgcolor|#fff, viewBox|0 0 660 280
    $
        var opt = {};
        opt.y0 = 10;
        opt.y1 = 10;
        opt.y1a = 90;
        opt.y2 = 210;
        opt.ybottom = 250;
        opt.color = color;
    preserve-aspect-ratio xMidYMid meet
    viewBox ${viewBox}
    rect
        x 0
        y 0
        width 660
        height 280
        fill ${bgcolor}
        stroke none
    polyline
        stroke ${color}
        fill ${color}
        stroke-width 2
        points 10 ${opt.ybottom} 45 ${opt.y0} 60 ${opt.y0} 75 ${opt.y1a + 40} 120 ${opt.y2} 120 ${opt.y1a + 40} 175 ${opt.y2} 175 ${opt.y1a + 20} 230 ${opt.y2} 230 ${opt.ybottom}
    i( 250, &opt )
    z( 320, &opt )
    z( 450, &opt )
    i( 590, &opt )
"},"t/images/t/z.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params l:integer, &opt
    polyline
        stroke ${opt.color}
        fill ${opt.color}
        stroke-width 2
        points ${l} ${opt.ybottom} ${l} ${opt.ybottom - 20} ${l+100} ${opt.y1a+40} ${l+80} ${opt.y1a+20} ${l+80} ${opt.y1a} ${l+130} ${opt.y1a} ${l+100} ${opt.ybottom - 20} ${l+120} ${opt.ybottom - 20} ${l+120} ${opt.ybottom}
"},"t/images/t/i.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params l:integer, &opt
    polyline
        stroke ${opt.color}
        fill ${opt.color}
        stroke-width 2
        points ${l} ${opt.ybottom} ${l+10} ${opt.y1+80} ${l+40} ${opt.y1+80} ${l+50} ${opt.ybottom}
    path
        stroke ${opt.color}
        fill ${opt.color}
        stroke-width 2
        d M${l+30}, ${opt.y1+20} C${l+60},${opt.y1+40} ${l+0},${opt.y1+60} ${l+30}, ${opt.y1+74}
"},"t/layouts/site-scripts.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &opt
    $
        var useReact = opt.useReact || opt.useMaterialUI;
        var useBabel = useReact || opt.useBabel;
    
    $if opt.useAce
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            $if opt.production
                j( /public/lib/ace/src-min-noconflict/ace.js
            $else
                j( /public/lib/ace/src-noconflict/ace.js
        $else
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/ace/1.4.2/ace.js
    $if opt.useBootstrap
        j( /public/lib/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js
    $if opt.useEventEmitter
        j( https://unpkg.com/eventemitter3@latest/umd/eventemitter3.min.js
    $if opt.useCodemirror
        j( /public/lib/codemirror/lib/codemirror.js
        j( /public/lib/codemirror/mode/javascript/javascript.js
        j( /public/lib/codemirror/mode/xml/xml.js
        j( /public/lib/codemirror/theme/monokai.css
        j( /public/lib/codemirror/theme/twilight.css
    $if opt.useDeepDiff
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            j( /public/lib/flitbit/deep-diff.min.js
        $else
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/deep-diff/0.3.3/deep-diff.min.js
    $if opt.useKeycode
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            j( /public/lib/material-ui/keycode.min.2.2.0.js
        $else
            j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/keycode.js
    $if opt.useHighlight
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.13.1/highlight.min.js
        $else
            j( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.13.1/highlight.min.js
    $if opt.useInteractJs
        j( /public/lib/interactjs/interact.js
    $if opt.useJarallax
        j( /public/lib/object-fit-images/ofi.min.js
        $if opt.production
            j( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax.min.js
            j( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax-video.min.js
            j( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax-element.min.js
        $else
            j( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax.js

            j( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax-element.js
    $if opt.useJQuery || opt.useBootstrap
        $if opt.production
            j( /public/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js
        $else
            j( /public/lib/jquery/jquery.js
    $if opt.useJsonFormatter
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            j( /public/lib/json-formatter/json-formatter.js
        $else
            j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/json-formatter-js@2.2.1/dist/json-formatter.min.js
    $if opt.useJss
        js /public/lib/jss/jss.js
        js /public/lib/jss/jss-preset-default.js
    $if opt.useMarkdown
        j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/marked/marked.min.js
    $if opt.useMathJax
        j( https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-MML-AM_CHTML
    $if opt.usePopper
        j( /public/lib/popper/popper.js
    $if opt.usePrism
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            js /public/lib/prism/prism.js
        $else
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.6.0/prism.min.js
    $if opt.usePubSub
        js /public/lib/pubsub/pubsub.js
    $if useReact
        $if opt.production
            j( https://unpkg.com/prop-types@15.8.1/prop-types.min.js
        $else
            j( https://unpkg.com/prop-types@15.8.1/prop-types.js
        $if opt.useReactLatest
            $if opt.production
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.production.min.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.production.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@latest/umd/react.development.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.development.js
        $else
            $if opt.production
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.production.min.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18.2.0/umd/react-dom.production.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react@18.2.0/umd/react.development.js
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-dom@18.2.0/umd/react-dom.development.js
        $if opt.useClassNames
            j( /public/lib/react/classnames.js
        $if opt.useMaterialUI
            $if opt.materialUI.latest
                $if opt.production
                    j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@latest/umd/material-ui.production.min.js
                $else
                    j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@latest/umd/material-ui.development.js
            $else
                $if opt.production
                    $if opt.materialUI.v4
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@material-ui/core@4.12.4/umd/material-ui.development.min.js
                    $else
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@5.8.7/umd/material-ui.production.min.js
                $else
                    $if opt.materialUI.v4
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@material-ui/core@4.12.4/umd/material-ui.development.js
                    $else
                        j( https://unpkg.com/@mui/material@5.8.7/umd/material-ui.development.js
        $if opt.useRouter
            $if opt.local || opt.isWizziStudio
                j( /public/lib/react/react-router.min.4.3.1.js
            $else
                $if opt.useRouterLatest
                    j( https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom@latest/umd/react-router-dom.js
                $else
                    j( https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom@4.3.1/umd/react-router-dom.js
        $if opt.useReactGrid
            j( /public/lib/react/react-grid-layout.min.js
        $if opt.useDownshift
            $if opt.local || opt.isWizziStudio
                j( https://unpkg.com/downshift@6.1.7/dist/downshift.umd.js
            $else
                j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/downshift@2.0.10/dist/downshift.umd.min.js
        $if opt.useGridLayout
            $if opt.useGridLayoutLatest
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-grid-layout@latest/dist/react-grid-layout.min.js
            $else
                j( https://unpkg.com/react-grid-layout@1.3.4/dist/react-grid-layout.min.js
        $if opt.react.useStyledComponents
            js //unpkg.com/styled-components@4.0.1/dist/styled-components.min.js
        $if opt.react.useTransitionGroup
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/react-transition-group/4.4.1/react-transition-group.min.js
    $if opt.useRxJs
        j( /public/lib/rxjs/rxjs.umd.min.js
    $if opt.useScrollReveal
        j( /public/lib/scrollreveal/scrollreveal.js
    $if opt.useSplit
        js /public/lib/controls/split.js
    $if opt.useSweetalert
        j( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@7.31.1/dist/sweetalert2.all.min.js
    $if opt.useUnderscore
        $if opt.production
            j( /public/lib/underscore/underscore.min.js
        $else
            j( /public/lib/underscore/underscore.js
    $if opt.useVue
        j( https://unpkg.com/vue
    $if opt.useWizzi
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            j( /public/wizzi-play/scripts/wizzi.standalone.js
        $else
            j( /scripts/wizzi.standalone.js
    $if opt.useMathJax
        script
            #
                _ MathJax.Hub.Config
                    {
                        @ tex2jax
                            {
                                @ inlineMath [['$','$'], ['\\(','\\)']]
                                @ processEscapes true
    $if useBabel
        j( https://unpkg.com/babel-standalone@latest/babel.min.js
    $if opt.useMonaco
        j( /public/lib/monaco-editor/min/vs/loader.js
    $if opt.mainJs && opt.mainJs.length > 0
        $if useBabel
            script
                src ${opt.mainJs}
                type text/babel
        $else
            js ${opt.mainJs}
"},"t/layouts/site-styles.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &opt
    $if opt.useBootstrap
        css /public/lib/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css
    $if opt.useCodemirror
        s( /public/lib/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css
        s( /public/lib/codemirror/theme/monokai.css
        s( /public/lib/codemirror/theme/twilight.css
    $if typeof(wzCtx.aspect) !== 'undefined'
        $if wzCtx.aspect.AnimateCss
            $if wzCtx.aspect.production
                s( /public/lib/animatecss/animate.min.css
            $else
                s( /public/lib/animatecss/animate.css
    $if opt.useFontAwesome
        $
            var fontAwesomeKey = 'eab461efef';
        script
            src https://kit.fontawesome.com/${fontAwesomeKey}.js
            crossorigin anonymous
    $if opt.useFontRoboto
        s( https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto:300,400,500
    $if opt.useFontMaterialIcons
        s( https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons
    $if opt.useGoogleFonts
        $foreach item in opt.googleFonts
            css https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=${item}
    $if opt.useHighlight
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            s( /public/lib/highlight/styles/github.css
            s( /public/lib/highlightjs-master/dracula.css
        $else
            s( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/9.13.1/styles/default.min.css
    $if opt.useJarallax
        s( /public/lib/jarallax/jarallax.css
    $if opt.useJsonFormatter
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            s( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/json-formatter/0.7.0/json-formatter.min.css
        $else
            s( https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/json-formatter/0.7.0/json-formatter.min.css
    $if opt.useMaterialUI
        s( https://fonts.googleapis.com/icon?family=Material+Icons
    $if opt.usePopper
        s( /public/lib/popper/main.css
    $if opt.usePrism
        $if opt.isWizziStudio
            css /public/lib/prism/prism.css
        $else
            css https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.6.0/themes/prism.min.css
    $if opt.useSocial
        s( /public/lib/social/social-icons.css
    $if opt.useSweetalert
        s( https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/sweetalert2@7.31.1/dist/sweetalert2.min.css
    $if opt.mainCss && opt.mainCss.length > 0
        s( ${opt.mainCss}
"},"t/layouts/site.html.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &opt
    $
        var ca = 'm-s p-s color-header font-l font-w-xxl';
        var ca_inverse = 'm-s p-s color-header-inverse bg-color-header-inverse font-l font-w-xxl';
        var ca2 = 'color-header font-x font-w-s';
    head
        $if opt.title
            @title ${opt.title}
        meta
            charset utf-8
        meta
            name viewport
            content width=device-width, initial-scale=1
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.googleapis.com
        link
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.gstatic.com
            crossorigin
        link
            @ rel "stylesheet"
            @ href "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/normalize.css@8.0.1/normalize.min.css"
        css /ittf/css/main.css.ittf
        script
            module
                set window.__filename = 'browser'
                $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
                    var WizziBrowser
                        {
                            @ log
                                function
                                    var line
                                        _ Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments).map
                                            function
                                                param argument
                                                return
                                                    iif typeof argument === 'string'
                                                        then argument
                                                        else JSON.stringify(argument)
                                            ._ join
                                                @ '\n '
                                    if arguments.length > 1 && arguments[arguments.length-1] === '-'
                                        set line += new Array(50).join('-')
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent += line + '\n'
                            @ clearLog
                                function
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-log').textContent = ''
                            @ setStatus
                                function
                                    param status
                                    set document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-status').textContent = status
                            @ setContent
                                function
                                    param newContent
                                    var content = document.querySelector('#wizzi-browser-content')
                                    while content.hasChildNodes()
                                        _ content.removeChild(content.lastChild)
                                    _ content.appendChild(newContent)
        $hook head-styles-0
        $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
            @style
                css
                    # wizzi-browser-status
                        margin .5em 0
                        font-style italic
                    # wizzi-browser-log
                        margin .5em 0
                        white-space pre-wrap
                    # wizzi-browser-content
                        margin .5em 0
                    # status:empty, #log:empty, #content:empty
                        display none
        ./site-styles( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            style
                # ${opt.stickyNav}.sticky
                    position fixed
                    top 0
                . ${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin
                    padding-top ${opt.stickyNavOffset}px
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.visible
                        display block
                    # ${opt.stickyNavLogo}.hidden
                        display none
        $hook head-styles
        $hook head-styles-2
        $hook head-styles-3
        $hook head-scripts
    body
        . flex-row space-between bg-color-header color-header align-items-center
            id __main_navbar
            . flex-row
                a( , /, ${ca2}
                    div
                        style width: 80px; margin-top: 5px; margin-left: 20px;
                        images/logo(#efefef, #434343)
            . flex-row
                $if locals.user
                    $if opt.section != 'Starter'
                        a( Starter, /ittf/site/starter.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Starter
                    $if opt.section != 'Lab'
                        a( Lab, /ittf/site/lab.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Lab
                    $if opt.section != 'Productions'
                        a( Productions, /ittf/site/productions.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Productions
                    $if opt.section != 'Project'
                        a( Project, /ittf/site/project.html.ittf, ${ca}
                    $else
                        . ${ca_inverse}
                            + Project
            . flex-row
                $if opt.section != 'Docs'
                    a( Docs, /ittf/site/docs/concepts/overview.html.ittf, ${ca}
                $else
                    . ${ca_inverse}
                        + Docs
                a( Github, https://github.com/stfnbssl/wizzi, ${ca}
            . flex-row m-r-x
                $if locals.user
                    a( Profile, /account/profile, ${ca}
                    a( Log Out, /auth/logout, ${ca}
                $else
                    a( Log In, /auth/login, ${ca}
        $hook
        $hook body-scripts-0
        $if opt.isWizziStudio && !opt.useFirebase
            div
                # wizzi-browser-status
                # wizzi-browser-log
                # wizzi-browser-content
        ./site-scripts( &opt )
        $if opt.stickyNav
            script
                let header = document.getElementById("__main_navbar")
                let stickyBar = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNav}")
                $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                    let stickyLogo = document.getElementById("${opt.stickyNavLogo}")
                let stickyPos = ${opt.stickyNavOffset}
                _ window.addEventListener
                    @ "scroll"
                    =>
                        param e
                        let scrollPos = window.scrollY
                        log 'pre sticki', stickyPos, scrollPos, scrollPos > stickyPos
                        if scrollPos > stickyPos
                            _ stickyBar.classList.add('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.add('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('hidden')
                            log 'sticki', scrollPos
                        else
                            _ stickyBar.classList.remove('sticky')
                            _ header.classList.remove('${opt.stickyNav}OffsetMargin')
                            $if opt.stickyNavLogo
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.remove('visible')
                                _ stickyLogo.classList.add('hidden')
        $hook body-scripts
        $hook body-scripts-2
        $hook body-scripts-3
        $if opt.useHighlight
            script
                _ document.addEventListener
                    @ 'DOMContentLoaded'
                    =>
                        param event
                        _ document.querySelectorAll
                            @ 'pre .hljs'
                            ._ forEach
                                =>
                                    param block
                                    _ hljs.highlightBlock(block)
"},"t/models/docs/wzctx.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $global
        var wzCtx = {
            name: "stfnbssl.github.io/wizzi",
            version: "0.7.1",
            description: "Wizzi github page",
            author: "Stefano Bassoli",
            license: "MIT",
            Params: {
                title: "Wizzi",
                baseUrl: "https://stfnbssl.github.io/wizzi"
            },
            Section: {
                items: [
                    {
                        title: "Concepts",
                        url: "/ittf/site/docs/concepts/overview.html.ittf"
                    },
                    {
                        title: "How to",
                        url: "/ittf/site/docs/howtos/getstarted.html.ittf"
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Sample code",
                        url: "/ittf/site/docs/samplecode/overview.html.ittf"
                    },

    $params &md
    PORT=${wzCtx.App.port}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useSession
        SESSION_SECRET=${wzCtx.Build.session.secret}
    NO_CACHE=${wzCtx.Build.noCache}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useCors
        CORS_CLIENT_ORIGIN=${wzCtx.Build.cors.clientOrigin}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useWizzi
        IS_WIZZI_DEV=${wzCtx.Build.wizzi.isDev}
        WIZZI_BASE_PATH=${wzCtx.Build.wizzi.basePath}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useAuthentication
        $if wzCtx.Build.authentication.useGithub
            $if wzCtx.Build.authentication.isLocal
                GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.clientIdLocal}
                GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.clientSecretLocal}
                GITHUB_CALLBACK_URL=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.callbackURLLocal}
            $else
                GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.clientId}
                GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.clientSecret}
                GITHUB_CALLBACK_URL=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.github.callbackURL}
        $if wzCtx.Build.authentication.useGoogle
            $if wzCtx.Build.authentication.isLocal
                GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.clientIdLocal}
                GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.clientSecretLocal}
                GOOGLE_CALLBACK_URL=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.callbackURLLocal}
            $else
                GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.clientId}
                GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.clientSecret}
                GOOGLE_CALLBACK_URL=${wzCtx.Build.authentication.google.callbackURL}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useMongoDb
        MONGO_HOST=${wzCtx.Build.mongoDb.host}
        MONGO_USER=${wzCtx.Build.mongoDb.user}
        MONGO_PASSWORD=${wzCtx.Build.mongoDb.password}
        MONGO_PATH=${wzCtx.Build.mongoDb.dbPath}/${wzCtx.Build.mongoDb.dbName}
    $if wzCtx.Build.useRedis
        REDIS_CA=${wzCtx.Build.redis.ca}
        REDIS_URL=${wzCtx.Build.redis.url}
        REDIS_PASSWORD=${wzCtx.Build.redis.password}
"},"t/v08/eslint/rc/extends.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $if wzCtx.Build.useExpo
        @ 'universe/native'
        @ 'universe/node'
        @ 'universe/web'
        @ 'universe/shared/typescript-analysis'
    $else
        @ 'standard'
        @ 'eslint:recommended'
        @ 'plugin:@typescript-eslint/eslint-recommended'
        @ 'plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended'
"},"t/v08/eslint/rc/overrides.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    {
        [ files
            $if wzCtx.Build.useTypescript
                @ '*.ts'
                @ '*.tsx'
                @ '*.d.ts'
        { parserOptions
            $if wzCtx.Build.useTypescript
                @ project './tsconfig.json'
        { rules
            [ '@typescript-eslint/naming-convention'
                @ 'warn'
                {
                    @ selector 'typeLike'
                    [ format
                        @ 'PascalCase'
                {
                    @ selector 'enumMember'
                    [ format
                        @ 'UPPER_CASE'
            @ 'no-unused-expressions' 'off'
            $if wzCtx.Build.useTypescript
                @ '@typescript-eslint/no-unused-expressions' 'warn'
"},"t/v08/eslint/rc/parser.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    @ parser '@typescript-eslint/parser'
        ## This allows ESLint to understand TypeScript syntax.
            # This is required, or else ESLint will throw errors
            # as it tries to parse TypeScript code as if it were regular JavaScript.
    { parserOptions
        @ ecmaVersion 2018
        @ sourceType "module"
    { env
        $if wzCtx.Build.useWebpack || wzCtx.Build.useReact
            @ browser true
        @ es6 true
"},"t/v08/eslint/rc/plugins.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $if wzCtx.Build.usePrettier

    @ '@typescript-eslint'

    $params &md
    import fetch from 'node-fetch'
    import path from 'path'
    import git from 'isomorphic-git'
    import http from 'isomorphic-git/http/node'
    import
        @ createFsFromVolume
        @ Volume
        from 'memfs'
    import
        @ vfile
        @ FsImpl
        @ FileDef
        from 'wizzi-utils'
    import
        @ FileDiff
        @ FileDiffItem
        from '../repo/types'
    import
        @ PackiFiles
        from '../packi/types'
    import
        @ GithubRepoOptions
        @ CreateGithubRepoOptions
        @ CreateGithubBranchOptions
        @ ClonedGitRepository
        @ GithubApiRepository
        from './types'
    +
    const volume = new Volume()
    +
    const fs = createFsFromVolume(volume)
    +
    set (fs as any).kind = 'filesystem'
    const wizzifs
        _ vfile
            + fs
                :as
                    :ref FsImpl
    +
    :type cb
        :< T
        :=>
            :void
            param err
                :any
            param result
                :ref T
        # const dir = fs.mkdtempSync(path.join(os.tmpdir(), 'test-'));
    +
    export
        async-function getRepositories
            param accessToken
                :string
            :return
                :ref Promise
                    :param
                        :[
                            :ref GithubApiRepository
            return
                _ fetch
                    `lit
                        + https://api.github.com/user/repos
                    _ getOptions(accessToken)
                    ._ then
                        =>
                            param response
                            _ response.json()
                    ._ then
                        =>
                            param responseData
                                :any
                            return responseData
        # const dir = fs.mkdtempSync(path.join(os.tmpdir(), 'test-'));
    +
    export
        async-function getRepository
            param owner
                :string
            param repo
                :string
            param accessToken
                :string
            :return
                :ref Promise
                    :param any
            return
                _ fetch
                    `lit
                        + https://api.github.com/repos/
                        @ owner
                        + /
                        @ repo
                        +
                    _ getOptions(accessToken)
                    ._ then
                        =>
                            param response
                            _ response.json()
                    ._ then
                        async=>
                            param responseData
                                :any

    function filesDiff
        param dir
            :string
        param packiFiles
            :ref PackiFiles
        param callback
            :ref cb
                :param
                    :{
                        :index
                            :ref FileDiff
                            param k
                                :string
        :return
            :void
        _ wizzifs.getFiles
            @ dir
            {
                @ deep true
                @ documentContent true
            =>
                param err
                param result
                const diff
                    :{
                        :index
                            :ref FileDiff
                            param k
                                :string
                    =
                        {
                _ result.forEach
                    =>
                        param entry
                        if entry.relPath.startsWith('.git/') == false
                            set diff[entry.relPath] =
                                {
                                    @ kind '-'
                                    { a
                                        @ path entry.relPath
                                        @ content
                                            @expr entry.content
                                                :as
                                                    :string
                _ Object.keys(packiFiles).forEach
                    =>
                        param entryName
                        if diff[entryName]
                            if
                                test
                                    &&
                                        + diff[entryName].a
                                        ===
                                            @expr
                                                (
                                                    @expr diff[entryName].a
                                                        :as
                                                            :ref FileDiffItem
                                                . content
                                            + packiFiles[entryName].contents
                                delete diff[entryName]
                            else
                                set diff[entryName].kind = '<>'
                                set diff[entryName].b =
                                    {
                                        @ path entryName
                                        @ content packiFiles[entryName].contents
                        else
                            set diff[entryName] =
                                {
                                    @ kind '+'
                                    { b
                                        @ path entryName
                                        @ content packiFiles[entryName].contents
                _ callback(null, diff)

                        @ dir

                            for

        if accessToken

    $params &md
    import
        @ Router
        @ Request
        @ Response
        from 'express'
    import
        as bodyParser
        from 'body-parser'
    import
        @ ControllerType
        @ AppInitializerType
        from '../../app/types'
    import
        @ githubTypes
        @ githubApiCalls
        @ githubUtils
        from '../../github'
    import
        @ authManager
        from '../../auth'
    import
        @ PackiFiles
        @ TemplateList
        @ Template
        from '../types'
    import
        @ sendPromiseResult
        @ sendSuccess
        @ sendFailure
        from '../../../utils/sendResponse'
    import
        @ TokenError
        from 'passport-oauth2'
    var jsonParser = bodyParser.json()
    export
        class GithubController
            :implements ControllerType
            p path
                :public
                = '/api/v1/github'
            p router
                :public
                _ Router()
            => initialize
                param initValues
                    :ref AppInitializerType
                _ this.router.get
                    `lit
                        +
                        @ this.path
                        + /ownedrepos/:uid
                    @ this.getOwnedRepositories
                _ this.router.get
                    `lit
                        +
                        @ this.path
                        + /clone/:uid/:owner/:name/:branch/:kind
                    @ this.cloneRepository
                _ this.router.post
                    `lit
                        +
                        @ this.path
                        + /commit/:uid/:owner/:name/:branch
                    @ this.commitRepository
            p getOwnedRepositories
                :private
                async=>
                    param request
                        :ref Request
                    param response
                        :ref Response
                    const accessToken
                        await
                            _ authManager.getAccessTokenFromAccount(request.params.uid, 'github.com')
                    const repos
                        await
                            _ githubApiCalls.getRepositories(accessToken)
                    const reposMeta
                        _ repos.map
                            =>
                                param value
                                _ githubUtils.apiRepositoryToMeta(value)
                    _ sendSuccess(response, reposMeta)
            p cloneRepository
                :private
                async=>
                    param request
                        :ref Request
                    param response
                        :ref Response
                    const owner = request.params.owner
                    const name = request.params.name
                    const branch = request.params.branch
                    const kind = request.params.kind
                    const accessToken
                        await
                            _ authManager.getAccessTokenFromAccount(request.params.uid, 'github.com')
                    const repo
                        await
                            _ githubApiCalls.cloneBranch
                                {
                                    @ owner
                                    @ name
                                    @ token accessToken
                                @ branch
                                @ kind
                    _ sendSuccess(response, repo)
            p commitRepository
                :private
                async=>
                    param request
                        :ref Request
                    param response
                        :ref Response
                    const owner = request.params.owner
                    const name = request.params.name
                    const branch = request.params.branch
                    const files
                        :ref PackiFiles
                        = request.body.files
                    _ authManager.getAccessTokenFromAccount(request.params.uid, 'github.com').then
                        =>
                            param accessToken
