    $
      var myName = 'CodepenDatePicker'; 
      //

    # from https://codepen.io/tomuzarowski/pen/xxZOEGV
    
    iife_window( controls, ${myName} )
        function triggerChange
            param el
            var event = document.createEvent("HTMLEvents")
            _ event.initEvent("change", true, false)
            _ el.dispatchEvent(event)
        class ${myName}
            ctor 
                param inputSelector
                set this.input = document.querySelector(inputSelector)
                set this.form = this.input.parentElement
                set this.popupContainer = null
                set this.monthContainer = null
                set this.tableContainer = null
                set this.table = document.createElement("table")
                set this.months =
                    [ 
                        @ 'January'
                        @ 'February'
                        @ 'March'
                        @ 'April'
                        @ 'May'
                        @ 'June'
                        @ 'July'
                        @ 'August'
                        @ 'September'
                        @ 'October'
                        @ 'November'
                        @ 'December'
                set this.selectedMonth = new Date().getMonth()
                set this.selectedYear = new Date().getFullYear()
                _ this.buildCalendar()
                _ this.setMainEventListener()
            m buildCalendar
                set this.popupContainer = document.createElement("div")
                _ this.popupContainer.classList.add("calendar-popup")
                _ this.form.appendChild(this.popupContainer)
                set this.monthContainer = document.createElement("div")
                _ this.monthContainer.classList.add("month-and-year")
                set this.monthContainer.innerHTML =
                    `lit 
                        + <h4>
                        _ this.getMonth()
                        +  
                        _ this.getYear()
                        + </h4>
                _ this.popupContainer.appendChild(this.monthContainer)
                _ this.createButtons()
                _ this.populateTable(this.selectedMonth, this.selectedYear)
            m createButtons
                const prev = document.createElement("button")
                _ prev.classList.add('button', 'prev')
                set prev.innerHTML = "<i class='fas fa-chevron-left'></i>"
                const next = document.createElement("button")
                _ next.classList.add('button', 'next')
                set next.innerHTML = "<i class='fas fa-chevron-right'></i>"
                _ prev.addEventListener
                    @ "click"
                    => 
                        param e
                        _ e.preventDefault()
                        _ this.updateMonth(this.selectedMonth - 1)
                _ next.addEventListener
                    @ "click"
                    => 
                        param e
                        _ e.preventDefault()
                        _ this.updateMonth(this.selectedMonth + 1)
                _ this.popupContainer.appendChild(prev)
                _ this.popupContainer.appendChild(next)
            m populateTable
                param month
                param year
                set this.table.innerHTML = ""
                const namesRow = document.createElement("tr")
                const days
                  [ 
                      @ "Mon"
                      @ "Tue"
                      @ "Wed"
                      @ "Thu"
                      @ "Fri"
                      @ "Sat"
                      @ "Sun"
                _ days.forEach
                    => 
                        param name
                        const th = document.createElement("th")
                        set th.innerHTML = name
                        _ namesRow.appendChild(th)
                _ this.table.appendChild(namesRow)
                const tempDate = new Date(year, month, 1)
                let firstMonthDay = tempDate.getDay()
                set firstMonthDay =
                    iif firstMonthDay === 0
                        then 7
                        else tempDate.getDay()
                const daysInMonth = this.getDaysInMonth(month, year)
                const j = daysInMonth + firstMonthDay - 1
                let tr = document.createElement("tr")
                if firstMonthDay - 1 !== 0
                    set tr = document.createElement("tr")
                    _ this.table.appendChild(tr)
                for let i = 0; i < firstMonthDay - 1; i++
                    const td = document.createElement("td")
                    set td.innerHTML = ""
                    _ tr.appendChild(td)
                for let i = firstMonthDay - 1; i < j; i++
                    if i % 7 === 0
                        set tr = document.createElement("tr")
                        _ this.table.appendChild(tr)
                    const td = document.createElement("td")
                    set td.innerText = i - firstMonthDay + 2
                    set td.dayNr = i - firstMonthDay + 2
                    _ td.classList.add("day")
                    _ td.addEventListener
                        @ "click"
                        => 
                            param e
                            const selectedDay = e.target.innerHTML
                            _ this.fillInput(selectedDay)
                            _ this.hideCalendar()
                    _ tr.appendChild(td)
                _ this.popupContainer.appendChild(this.table)
            m fillInput
                param day
                set day =
                    iif day < 10
                        then "0" + day
                        else day
                let month = null
                set month =
                    iif this.selectedMonth < 9
                        then "0" + (this.selectedMonth + 1)
                        else this.selectedMonth + 1
                set this.input.value =
                    `lit 
                        + 
                        @ day
                        + .
                        @ month
                        + .
                        @ this.selectedYear
                        + 
                _ triggerChange                        
                  @ this.input
            m updateMonth
                param month
                set this.selectedMonth = month
                if this.selectedMonth < 0
                    set this.selectedYear--
                    set this.selectedMonth = 11
                else
                    if this.selectedMonth > 11
                        set this.selectedYear++
                        set this.selectedMonth = 0
                set this.monthContainer.innerHTML =
                    `lit 
                        + <h4>
                        @ this.months[this.selectedMonth]
                        +  
                        @ this.selectedYear
                        + </h4>
                _ this.populateTable(this.selectedMonth, this.selectedYear)
            m getMonth
                return this.months[this.selectedMonth]
            m getYear
                return this.selectedYear
            m getDaysInMonth
                param month
                param year
                return new Date(year, month + 1, 0).getDate()
            m hideCalendar
                _ this.form.classList.remove("open")
            m setMainEventListener
                _ this.input.addEventListener
                    @ "click"
                    => 
                        param e
                        _ this.form.classList.toggle("open")
                        if !this.form.classList.contains("open")
                            _ this.hideCalendar()"},"t/api/t/packiManager.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $
        var myName = 'Wizzi';
        //

    iife_window( api, ${myName}, increment )

      class PackiManager
        ctor
          param packiFiles
          set this.packiFiles = packiFiles || {}
          set this.dmp = new diff_match_patch()
        
        m getFileContent
          param filePath
          const file = this.packiFiles[filePath] 
          return file ? file.contents : null

        m putFile
          param filePath
          param type
          param contents
          set this.packiFiles[filePath] 
            {
              @ type type
              @ contents contents

        m putCodeFile
          param filePath
          param contents
          _ this.putFile
            @ filePath
            @ 'CODE'
            @ contents
        
        m deleteFile
          param filePath
          delete this.packiFiles[filePath]

        m getFileDiffs
          param filePath
          param newContent
          const diffs
            _ this._diffLineMode
              @ this.packiFiles[filePath].contents
              @ newContent
          return diffs

        m applyFileDiffs
          param filePath
          param diffs
          const textToPatch = this.packiFiles[filePath].contents
          const patches
            _ this.dmp.patch_make
              @ textToPatch
              @ diffs
          const [patchedText, results]
            _ this.dmp.patch_apply(patches, textToPatch)
          set this.packiFiles[filePath].contents = patchedText

        m getPackiFilesDiffs
          param packiFiles
          const matches = {}
          foreach key in Object.keys(packiFiles)
            if this.packiFiles[key]
              set matches[key]
                {
                  @ d 0
                  @ diffs
                    _ this._diffLineMode
                      @ this.packiFiles[key].contents
                      @ packiFiles[key].contents
            else
              set matches[key]
                {
                  @ d 1
                  @ type packiFiles[key].type
                  @ contents packiFiles[key].contents
          foreach key in Object.keys(this.packiFiles)
            if !packiFiles[key]
              set matches[key]
                {
                  @ d -1
          return matches

        m applyPatch
          param packiDiffs
          const patchedFiles = {}
          foreach key in Object.keys(packiDiffs)
            if packiDiffs[key].d == 1
              set patchedFiles[key]
                {
                  @ type packiDiffs[key].type
                  @ contents packiDiffs[key].contents
            elif packiDiffs[key].d == 0
              const textToPatch = this.packiFiles[key].contents
              const patches 
                _ this.dmp.patch_make
                  @ textToPatch
                  @ packiDiffs[key].diffs
              log 'applyPatch.key.patches', key, patches
              const [patchedText, results]
                _ this.dmp.patch_apply(patches, textToPatch)
              set patchedFiles[key]
                {
                  @ type this.packiFiles[key].type
                  @ contents patchedText
          set this.packiFiles = patchedFiles

        m equals
          param packiFiles
          const matches = {}
          foreach key in Object.keys(packiFiles)
            if this.packiFiles[key]
              if this.packiFiles[key].type != packiFiles[key].type
                return false
              if this.packiFiles[key].contents != packiFiles[key].contents
                return false
              set matches[key]
                {
            else
              return false
          foreach key in Object.keys(this.packiFiles)
            if !packiFiles[key]
              return false
          return true

        m _diffLineMode
          param text1
          param text2
          var a = this.dmp.diff_linesToChars_(text1, text2)
          var lineText1 = a.chars1
          var lineText2 = a.chars2
          var lineArray = a.lineArray
          var diffs = this.dmp.diff_main(lineText1, lineText2, false)
          _ this.dmp.diff_charsToLines_(diffs, lineArray)
          return diffs    
      
      set ${myName}.PackiManager = PackiManager


"},"t/api/t/wizzi/cdn.js.ittf":{"type":"CODE","contents":"$group
    $params &md
    iife_window( api, ${md.ApiName}, increment )
        
        set ${md.ApiName}.createCdnResource
          function
              param owner
              param name
              param contents
              log '${md.ApiName}.createCdnResource', 'owner', owner, 'name', name, 'contents', contents
              r_promise()
                  _ api.Fetch.post
                      { 
                          @ url '${md.apiUrl}/cdn/' + encodeURIComponent(owner) + '/' + encodeURIComponent(name)
                          { body
                            @ contents
                      ._ then
                          =>
                              param response
                              info 'createCdnResource.response', response
                              _ resolve
                                  @ response
                      catch_reject( createCdnResource )
          #
              # 
              # Creates a new CdnResource item
              # 
              # @param {string} [owner] The owner of the production item
              # @param {string} [name] The name of the production item
              # @param {string} [contents] The contents of the resource
              #          

        set ${md.ApiName}.updateCdnResource
          function
              param name
              param type
              log '${md.ApiName}.updateCdnResource', 'owner', owner, 'name', name 
              r_promise()
                  _ api.Fetch.put
                      { 
                          @ url '${md.apiUrl}/cdn/' + encodeURIComponent(owner) + '/' + encodeURIComponent(name)
                          { body
                            @ contents
                      ._ then
                          =>
                              param response
                              info 'updateCdnResource.response', response
                              _ resolve
                                  @ response
                      catch_reject( updateCdnResource )
          #
              # 
              # Updates a CdnResource item
              # 
              # @param {string} [owner] The owner of the production item
              # @param {string} [name] The name of the production item
              # @param {string} [contents] The contents of the resource
              #

        set ${md.ApiName}.deleteCdnResource
          function
              param name
              param type
              log '${md.ApiName}.deleteCdnResource', 'owner', owner, 'name', name 
              r_promise()
                  _ api.Fetch.delete
                      { 
                          @ url '${md.apiUrl}/cdn/' + encodeURIComponent(owner) + '/' + encodeURIComponent(name)
                          { body
                            @ contents
                      ._ then
                          =>
                              param response
                              info 'putResource.response', response
                              _ resolve
                                  @ response
                      catch_reject( deleteCdnResource )
          #
              # 
              # Deletes a CdnResource item
              # 
              # @param {string} [owner] The owner of the production item
              # @param {string} [name] The name of the production item
              #              "}}

        var myName = 'MonacoEditor';
        //

        const editorStates = new Map()

        set ${myName}.prototype.getEditorTheme
            function
              param theme

              else

        set ${myName}.prototype.componentDidMount
            function
                const
                    {
                        @ files
                        @ selectedFileName
                        @ autoFocus
                        @ updateFiles
                        @ onSelectFile

                        ... rest
                    = this.props
                const options
                    {
                        @ ...rest
                        @ theme this.getEditorTheme(rest.theme, selectedFileName)

                const editor

                set this._editor = editor

                const openEditorBase = codeEditorService.openCodeEditor.bind(codeEditorService)
                set codeEditorService.openCodeEditor =
                    async=>

                        const
                            {

        set ${myName}.prototype.componentDidUpdate
            function

                        _ editorStates.set(prevProps.selectedFileName, this._editor.saveViewState())

                            @ tabSize 4
